July 25 · "Received my new bottles of Doc Holliday Sauces yesterday! OMG!!! I am in love! Tasted it straight out of the bottle! Now I gotta get cookin"! Thank you so very much!"


Matt Stacherski via Doc Holliday Sauces Facebook Page:
May 13 · "Who said you can't put steak sauce on your chicken? Thank you Joycelyn Alexander and Doc Holliday Sauces for bringing my first BBQ of the season to life. Give their page a like and take my word for it, the sauce is excellent. Works great as a marinade too."


Heather Roling‏@crochet_crazy

Smoked pork loin chops rubbed with @DocSauces and my secret spice rub #yumm

Heather Roling ‏@crochet_crazy  1m

@DocSauces and a great job ur doing! I have been having all my friends sample the sauce and it's a hit here!!!

But without the addition of the 3 new sauces and marinades, our road will begin to crumble because the income from one item cannot sustain the growth we are experiencing let alone launch any new products.


WHY DO WE NEED YOUR MONEY?

  • To grow our brand and distribution to a nation-wide "clean" eating, lower cost alternative to the big artificial ingredient sauce brands that currently define the market.

  • Funds are to be used to increase production,produce  new line of sauces and marinades, build infrastructure and a robust marketing platform to promote the "clean" sauce alternative across the country. Costs for larger production runs will aid in keeping the commercial price of Doc Holliday Sauces below those of large standard sauce competitors brands dominating supermarket shelves.
  • New Packaging: 3 new flavors = front label, back label and neck wrap
  • New Display: We will be producing what is known in the industry as a "Shipper Display". A shipper display has all 4 products (Steak Sauce and 3 flavors of BBQ) packed into the same shipping carton; when it arrives at the retail location, it is opened and assembled into a self contained display.

(Example Figure 1)



  • Warehouse Expansion that is desperately needed: Pallet racks

  • Website completion

  • Distributor and Retail Chain Slotting Fees; You pay for warehouse space with distributors and shelf space with the retail chains.


Simply put, your contribution will get us the labels, initial production run, and warehousing.

If we do not reach our goal, the funds raised will be disbursed in the following order:

  • Labels
  • First production run of New Sauces and Marinades
  • Shipper displays
Everything else is secondary.

The Impact of your Contribution...

Your contribution will help make Doc Holliday Sauces, LLC remain a viable and profitable company for years to come. We chose Indiegogo, because it is a "grassroots" funding resource and truth be told, without your help in expanding our product line and infrastructure, it will be difficult to continue.

We started Doc Holliday Sauces with $200.00 in 2012 as Manufacturers Representatives and have built it into what is today, but to remain viable and profitable, we need to bring out our new line of sauces. One SKU, (or one item) in the marketplace, is a hard road to travel profit wise. So with the addition of the new sauces, our sales for 2015 are projected to be north of $500,000.00.

Your contribution also helps in another way; although we are a small company, we have found a way to give something back to the brave men and women who have fought for and sacrificed so much for this country. 

Doc Holliday Sauces donates a small portion of the profit from the sale of every case to THE INTREPID FALLEN HEROES FUND... their logo is on every bottle!


Risks & Challenges

There are always risks and challenges in any business, but since we are already established in the marketplace, those risks are lessened because of the commitment from over 60% of our current retailer base.


    Other Ways You Can Help

    Help us get the word out; share us on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and with the Indiegogo share tools.

    Share our Facebook Page, www.facebook.com/dochollidaysauces , share and follow us on Twitter at https://twitter.com/DocSauces.

    If you want to find out if Doc Holliday is available in your area, go to www.facebook.com/dochollidaysauces and click on the locations tab. 

    We thank you all for your time and everything you do no matter what it is, to help us realize our dream!
story_txt:
OUR STORY... Doc Holliday Sauces is a Lake Orion, Michigan based "Clean" Ingredient sauce producer that was launched in February of 2012 with the introduction of our "CLEAN" ingredient steak sauce. 
My name is Raymond Najor and the beautiful Hawaiian girl next me is Joycelyn Alexander; my business partner and fiance.



Our mission, is to make Doc Holliday Sauces, part of the 'CLEAN' eating movement that is Rapidly growing across the country and to challenge the myth, that all natural, gluten free foods have to cost more. 

We felt that Indiegogo - being a "Grassroots" funding resource - was our best option, because the contributors are everyday people like us... Unlike the banks that have told us that we have not been in business long enough to qualify for a loan! 


Our sauces not only challenge the marketplace standard, but was inspired by the need to show the consumer that it doesn't have to cost more to eat healthy; that a 'CLEAN' healthy alternative that is free of artificial preservatives and colors, is gluten free and bears a lower consumer price than even standard sauces by giant corporate brands, let alone those 'pricey' so called "all natural" competitors!

Demand for our clean sauce alternative is growing; meeting the demand for our steak sauce is not the issue; the issue, is that the steak sauce is the only item we have in the marketplace, and with all the expenses involved; production, labels, freight, etc., all we are doing is breaking even.With the introduction of our new line of sauces and marinades into the marketplace, Doc Holliday Sauces becomes self sufficient and self sustaining... instead of 1 item in the market, we would now have 4, which for us, would mean an increase in revenue, market share and sustainability.Joyce and I have personally traveled to every state and nearly every store Doc Holliday is in. We do our own sales, our own demos (whenever possible) and have basically been our own marketing department. 

DOING A DEMO AT WESTERN MARKET IN CANTON, MI.

DEMO AT JOHNNY POMODORO'S  FRESH MARKET in FARMINGTON, MI.

At one point, I had been on the road for 2 months straight, only returning home twice to get some fresh clothing and to see my fiance Joycelyn.Doc Holliday Sauces is our life; We eat, sleep and dream Doc Holliday;  something that started as an idea in January of 2012 and became reality a month later. We started with $200.00; an old desk, phone, home computer and a small 300 square foot office that cost us $100.00 a month, in Downtown Pontiac, Michigan and have built it into what it is today.WE NEED THIS NEW LINE! Without the addition of the 3 new sauces, we are fighting a battle that always ends in a draw. Constantly breaking even without taking a salary is hard way to go.And we haven't: taken a salary that is.With your support, we will be able to have a successful line launch into roughly 50% of our current retail customer base, expand our warehousing, produce a shipper, build a stronger infrastructure and robust marketing platform to help promote our 'CLEAN' sauce alternative across the country.Not only will your contributions help make us viable and self sustaining, but your contributions will also be helping American Veterans suffering from Traumatic Brain Injuries and PTSD because Doc Holliday donates a SMALL portion of profits from the sale of every case to The Intrepid Fallen Heroes Fund! 



THERE'S NOTHING BETTER THAN GRILLED CHICKEN WITH DOC!

Joyce and I have put our lives into Doc Holliday Sauces; and not just our time; Our blood, sweat and tears, our passion and future and the future of our children and grandchildren! We have put every penny (and then some) we could scrape together into this endeavor!
We have been told we have the BEST STEAK SAUCE on the market; I believe it.

story:
Stop Sexually Abusive Yoga Teachers

Sadly, sex scandals are nothing new in the yoga world.

Students often make excuses for womanizers and even abusive leaders within their communities to the extent that many go on teaching years despite legal action and clear misconduct.

But at some point, enough is enough.

In response to recent sex scandal allegations about yoga gurus John Friend, Kausthub Desikachar, and Bikram Choudhury (some of the most publicized teachers of modern times), a purple-bracelet wearing clan of yoga students have stepped up to make yoga safe for everyone again.



Their moniker? “I Am My Own Guru”

The movement hopes to change all that by uniting his fellow students and colleagues in an effort to not only stop the abuse, but to stop the blind-faith guru system all together.

"There are no ethics committees or watchdog groups for yoga students, and yet teachers with huge power and influence are clearly taking advantage, and in some cases, even assaulting their students who came to class to get fit or relieve stress.

Yoga is not a religion, it’s a practice. We don’t need gurus, we need good teachers who we can trust to be safe and responsible. ‘I Am My Own Guru’ is about giving the power back to the students, and taking action against abusers.”

Wear a Purple Bracelet  - Change Yoga for the Better

“I Am My Own Guru” is a statement, a movement, and a complete paradigm shift away from the broken (and dangerous) model of guru/disciple group think, toward a healthier system where individuals are respected, honored, and above all, made to feel safe in what should be the safest of safe places – their yoga studio.

When you wear the bracelet, it says loud and clear, “enough is enough.”

100% of Donations Given to The Art of Yoga Project

The yoga community is 80% women, and yet sadly, women are most-often the victims of abuse. In an attempt to course correct, all proceeds raised from this project will be donated to, The Art of Yoga, a grassroots charity that uses yoga to transform the lives of young women in the California juvenile justice system, many of whom have been victims of abuse themselves.

 

Activate Your Community  

When you wear your “I Am My Own Guru” bracelet, it says you’re strong and self-empowered. It says that you’ve come to yoga class to take care of your body and mind – not to get manipulated, groped or assaulted.

Can a purple bracelet really change yoga? Only time will tell.


Disturbing News You Might Not Know About...

  • Jane Doe 1 – Rape Lawsuit – May 2013
    (online version of court document)

  • Jane Doe 2 – Rape Lawsuit – May 2013
    (online version of court document)

  • Sexual Assault Case, Sarah Baughn – March 2013
    (NY Times Article)

  • “Women Are Bitches & Whores”, Pandora Williams 2010
    (ABC News)

  • Sexual Harassment Scandal Rocks Yoga Community
    (Huffington Post)

  • Shocking Bikram Sex Scandal Should Shock No One
    (The Daily Beast)

  • K. Desikachar Faces Abuse Allegations
    (Yoga Journal)

  • Varying Allegations of Sexual, Mental & Emotional Abuse
    (Blog)

  • Kausthub Desikachar’s Continued Silence
    (It’s All About Yoga)

  • Psychopathic Abuse of Power, Sexual Misconduct
    (Yoga Dork)

  • The Yogi Bhajan Cult: A Rapist Called Yogi Bhajan
    (The Sikh Archives)

  • Yogi’s Legacy in Question
    (The Register-Guard)

  • Abused his Position for Power, Money & Sex
    (The Gurumukh Yoga Forum)

  • Death of a Yogi
    (Willamette Week Newspaper)
     
  • Inside the Wiccan ‘Sex’ Coven
    (The Daily Beast)

  • Sex & The Fall of an All-American Yogi
    (NY Magazine)

  • The Collapse of Anusara Yoga
    (Texas Monthly)

  • John Friend Scandal
    (Huffington Post)

story:
We have created a very much needed life saving software application that needs to be on every electronic device world wide as soon as possible, 

And we need your help to get it there!

What Exactly Will We Use This Funding For?

We will use all of these much needed funds to properly finish up the development of our App. and the huge data base needed to run it. We will also run advertisements to help raise awareness of these deadly food safety problems that exist,  while spreading word of our problem solver App.

Most importantly this opportunity will enable us to be able to afford to provide a free version along with our premium version of S.T.O.P. All Recalls, this way everyone will be able to own it on any budget. We hope to be able to remain ad-free as well.

______________________________________________________________________


The average consumer is only aware of 1-5% of recalls and consumer warnings that directly effect them or their loved ones..

We live in a world full of unsafe and contaminated food caused by careless companies that put their profits over the well-being of the people. It doesn’t stop there, anything that you receive may seem to  be safe, but in fact be extremely defective(Cars,drinks,electronics,etc.)

There are two defenses that we have in place today, that are supposed to prevent these defective products from ever even reaching the consumer in the first place.

First, is the inspection process. Most people believe that this system does exactly what it seems it is suppose to do, which would be inspect everything that all of our food/ products come in contact with from start to finish.

Truth is...that there are way too many flaws in this system, And no where near enough enforced laws and regulations in it! 

1 in 6 people, will become sick from a foodborne illness this year.. About half of these innocent people who fall victim to foodborne illnesses, will suffer from effects many years after actually eating the contaminated food, that they usually don't even know they ate.

It is very common for people to believe all the food they eat, buy,and own is completely safe... 

Most people with life long health issues don't even know what is causing everything to go wrong with them, and its near impossible for doctors to be able to diagnose that their unusual symptoms are caused by defective/contaminated food. Typically because they wait so long to go get it checked out, And by then the foods long gone from their system, but the effects it has on the body don't usually just go away.

In some cases people who's immune systems had enough strength to help defeat cancer, couldn't even put up the fight against the deadly contaminated food they ate and then they passed away shortly after from the effects the systemic health issues had on their bodies. Even with the recent 2011 passing of the food modernization act that my uncle helped The Pew Organization pass...there still isn't any money being put into funding the fight against this epidemic, And everyday more and more unaware innocent people are dying because of it. 

As a safety precaution there is a second line of defense in place incase the product makes it past the inspection process, which there is a very good chance that it will...

This is called the recall system. It is designed to warn all consumers about products that are defective, and all food that is contaminated... That somehow wasn't noticed when it was being manufactured or inspected. 

This system has many flaws itself. In the past 5 years we’ve 
seen a dramatic increase in recalls in the U.S. and its only been getting worse.The current recall system requires all manufacturers and companies to report all recalls to the public, to warn consumers that they need to return or dispose of these defective or contaminated items immediately. 

The biggest problem with this system, is the way these recalls are distributed. There’s no organization of this information, which leads to a very dangerously low rate of informed consumers!!

I used to think between the news and social media, that i knew about all or most of the dangerous recalls out there. 

I was completely wrong, I wasn't even aware of 5% of them, And I was in the same position most of the world is in today.. I was trusting an untrustworthy industry to produce food and products that were safe, and if there was something wrong with them i trusted an unreliable source of inspectors to find the problem and correct it before it was even available to be purchased by me or anyone else. 

Also, If it couldn't be corrected i expected that the news/internet headlines would report every single recall to me, but that's not the case at all. Today if someone wants to know if a certain product is recalled they need to be their own investigator, and a good one at that. 

It takes up endless hours of your time to do all the research, and you still wont find every recall that effects you directly,and it shouldn't have to be that way. It should be a lot easier on the consumer!

One day this was all brought to my attention by my uncle getting sick from eating some recalled peanut butter, that he had no idea was recalled... That's because it wasn’t recalled for an entire year! 

The day he ate it he immediately began to feel horrible and knew something wasn't right. When he went to the doctors, they had no idea what was wrong with him.. He suffered from multiple infections and other life changing symptoms that still effect him to this day, And they are taking a major tole on his life. Not just him hundreds of thousands of people across the world are in his same position, if not worse, or dead.

After becoming sick and realizing what caused it to happen, and discovering how big of an epidemic this problem really was..He then became a food advocate, inspiring many people like me and everybody here at S.T.O.P. All Recalls to pay more attention to the food we are eating. Before we even buy it, while spreading the word to everyone we could..About this silent serial killer!!

When i learned how bad this problem was, I immediately began to start thinking of a solution. I knew there had to be a better way of warning people about all these recalls, and there had to be a way to only inform the consumer of the products that they are prone to purchase, or already have purchased. Then it hit me.. 
What was missing was a software application!!

An app. like nothing before it, that takes each individual recall and distributes it directly to each individual affected consumer, store,  restaurant, or potential affected consumers/stores/restaurants..  
This patented app., “The Direct Digital Distribution Of Life Saving Information Software Application” is unlike anything on the market because its the only one of its kind. Its designed to do one thing and one thing only..And that is to save as many lives as it possibly can.

Today, there are endless amounts of recalls being issued, that majority of the population are completely un-aware of...

This a big problem, but we have an even bigger solution to solve it!

Let me start by explaining to you how this life saving application works.. 

Picture each recall as a local news headline, if every local news headline across the country/world were all reported on the same station, and on the same website with no organization it would be completely too difficult for anyone to use efficiently.Therefore people wouldn't even bother looking.

Which is exactly what’s happening with these recalls, and has been for entirely too long. It’s time for a major change. It’s time for The S.T.O.P. All Recalls App. to be on every app. accessible electronic device possible. 

When a user first downloads this application to their electronic device(Cell phone, tablet, computer, car, etc.), they get to setup a profile containing all the items they buy, bought, or plan to buy in the future. They may also select items that they want to receive information on that someone they know might buy or own, such as their children, relatives, or pets. They can always go back and edit these selections at any time. 

The user then identifies their city, state, and most shopped at stores or locations...

When choosing what groceries, the consumer is presented with a list that breaks down food as you would find it within the grocery store. Into categories such as (Vegetables, Fruits, Seafood, Meat, Bread, Canned Goods, Rice, Oils, Dressings, Flour/Cooking Products, Peanut Butter, Cookies/Packaged Deserts, Candy, Soups, Jelly/Jams, Coffee, Condiments, Milk, Cheese, Etc.)

Keeping the selection process as simple as possible is the key to keep the consumer interested, which also keeps the consumer informed.

Each user can also go through many other lists of a huge selection of products that they may want to be notified about if there are any recalls or consumer warnings for them to.. Such as ( Medicine, Prescription Medicine, Vitamins, Automobiles, Clothing, Building Materials, Baby Products, Pet Food, Other Pet Products, Makeup/Beauty Supplies, Etc.). 

Every item will display a picture icon next to it for easier identification, and with one touch on either the name or icon, they simply add the item to their list of “Important Info I Need To Know,” and continue scrolling down. 

This makes it to where the user will receive all info. about that item.
After filling out the information on their profile the users are then directed to

 “The Welcome Home Screen,” where they have access to 15 different menu's. 

- Important Info I Need To Know, Search All Recalls, Most Recalled Products, Deadly Disease Information, Protecting Your Pets, Diabetes Daily, Curing Cancer, All Consumer Warnings, Farm-Crop-&-Livestock, All Around The World, Restaurant Reviews, Local Weather And News,” (One local news station And one local weather station for each area.),Prescriptions & Vitamins, All Other Life Saving Info, And 24/7 Consumer Support.-


Within these 15 options,they can browse through endless amounts of life saving information..


“S.T.O.P. All Recalls” is operated by our team of dedicated food safety advocates who gather all recalls, consumer warnings, and life saving information from various trusted sources throughout the entire world wide internet. 

Our team also collects information from consumers, and other trusted partners who report it directly to us. All of this information gathered from every source will be verified to make sure that it is legitimate. 

We then track every store, restaurant, and location that the recalled item has been, or is due to be delivered to. And inform them, but usually it is too late of a recall being issued and most of the contaminated products have already been purchased by the consumer by the time the stores can be notified, but our policy at S.T.O.P. is to tell everyone about every single recall issued including telling stores and restaurants.

In order to distribute the life saving information directly to each affected user, we place all of this information into each specific affected area server folder under the individual item category. 
Then all users who live close to these locations or those who have selected these affected items/stores/locations as their favorites will be notified either the next time they open the app., or if they choose to receive push notifications from the app. to their device they will be alerted the second that we place the information into the database. 

This database is where all information throughout the entire application is accessed via the internet. Users can also browse through all of this information, even the recalls that they aren’t as prone to come in contact with. They can also always browse these recalls from all over within the “Search All Recalls” menu, located on the “The Welcome Home Screen.”

S.T.O.P. All Recalls will be known for our accurate reports, and the valuable life saving info. that we provide. Also our well known customer service,questions,and concerns 24 hour hot-line system will be available for consumers who need to talk to us at anytime about any questions, concerns, or reports of any recalls or consumer warnings or any life saving information that they might have for us. 

_____________________________________________________________________

Without this much needed App., products within every industry (food, auto, medication, clothing, etc.,) will unfortunately continue to see increases in recalls every year, and thats a proven fact.

There’s already laws and guidelines in place for all these industries. For now though, enforcing them isn’t on the top of our governments list of things to do. So just passing new laws won’t fix it, it has been tried too many times and proven to not make any major impacts on these food safety/product recall issues time and time again!!

That makes it up to us, the people of this fine country to take matters into our own hands. The only way to get everybody to pay attention to this issue, is to help bring it to is for us to help bring it to their attention. 

S.T.O.P. All Recalls works together with all the top food safety 
organizations, and eventually other big organizations will jump 
aboard and help us make sure that every single person who is 
alive today knows how many recalls are issued on a daily basis!! 

With this app. we will be able to save millions of lives by not only raising awareness of these issues, but eventually these manufacturers and huge companies will start taking the handling and inspection of their products way more seriously. 

They will then be forced to adapt or they will loose all of their customers as they continue to find out about their endless amount of recalls caused by their repeated poor decisions, through the info on our app. 

This App. is patent protected because we don't ever want its control to ever get into the wrong hands of anyone who may use it for the wrong reasons, or who may not take it seriously enough. We are positive that we have the prefect most fit, constant growing team of hard working food advocates that can handle running this new and improved recall system the right way.


All of you who pledge $25 and up will be one of the first people to receive our upgraded premium version of the S.T.O.P. All Recalls App. on the day it is released to the public, free of charge! (App. link will be distributed to you, via e-mail) 

Now that you are aware of this huge problem that continues to get worse day by day, you are left with two choices, 


Either you can help us S.T.O.P. the problem, Or you can accept it..

We hope you choose to walk with us.

Thank You For All Your Support!!
story_txt:
We have created a very much needed life saving software application that needs to be on every electronic device world wide as soon as possible, 
And we need your help to get it there!

What Exactly Will We Use This Funding For?
We will use all of these much needed funds to properly finish up the development of our App. and the huge data base needed to run it. We will also run advertisements to help raise awareness of these deadly food safety problems that exist,  while spreading word of our problem solver App.
Most importantly this opportunity will enable us to be able to afford to provide a free version along with our premium version of S.T.O.P. All Recalls, this way everyone will be able to own it on any budget. We hope to be able to remain ad-free as well.
______________________________________________________________________
The average consumer is only aware of 1-5% of recalls and consumer warnings that directly effect them or their loved ones..
We live in a world full of unsafe and contaminated food caused by careless companies that put their profits over the well-being of the people. It doesn’t stop there, anything that you receive may seem to  be safe, but in fact be extremely defective(Cars,drinks,electronics,etc.)
There are two defenses that we have in place today, that are supposed to prevent these defective products from ever even reaching the consumer in the first place.
First, is the inspection process. Most people believe that this system does exactly what it seems it is suppose to do, which would be inspect everything that all of our food/ products come in contact with from start to finish.
Truth is...that there are way too many flaws in this system, And no where near enough enforced laws and regulations in it! 
1 in 6 people, will become sick from a foodborne illness this year.. About half of these innocent people who fall victim to foodborne illnesses, will suffer from effects many years after actually eating the contaminated food, that they usually don't even know they ate.
It is very common for people to believe all the food they eat, buy,and own is completely safe... 
Most people with life long health issues don't even know what is causing everything to go wrong with them, and its near impossible for doctors to be able to diagnose that their unusual symptoms are caused by defective/contaminated food. Typically because they wait so long to go get it checked out, And by then the foods long gone from their system, but the effects it has on the body don't usually just go away.
In some cases people who's immune systems had enough strength to help defeat cancer, couldn't even put up the fight against the deadly contaminated food they ate and then they passed away shortly after from the effects the systemic health issues had on their bodies. Even with the recent 2011 passing of the food modernization act that my uncle helped The Pew Organization pass...there still isn't any money being put into funding the fight against this epidemic, And everyday more and more unaware innocent people are dying because of it. 
As a safety precaution there is a second line of defense in place incase the product makes it past the inspection process, which there is a very good chance that it will...
This is called the recall system. It is designed to warn all consumers about products that are defective, and all food that is contaminated... That somehow wasn't noticed when it was being manufactured or inspected. 
This system has many flaws itself. In the past 5 years we’ve seen a dramatic increase in recalls in the U.S. and its only been getting worse.The current recall system requires all manufacturers and companies to report all recalls to the public, to warn consumers that they need to return or dispose of these defective or contaminated items immediately. 
The biggest problem with this system, is the way these recalls are distributed. There’s no organization of this information, which leads to a very dangerously low rate of informed consumers!!
I used to think between the news and social media, that i knew about all or most of the dangerous recalls out there. 
I was completely wrong, I wasn't even aware of 5% of them, And I was in the same position most of the world is in today.. I was trusting an untrustworthy industry to produce food and products that were safe, and if there was something wrong with them i trusted an unreliable source of inspectors to find the problem and correct it before it was even available to be purchased by me or anyone else. 
Also, If it couldn't be corrected i expected that the news/internet headlines would report every single recall to me, but that's not the case at all. Today if someone wants to know if a certain product is recalled they need to be their own investigator, and a good one at that. 
It takes up endless hours of your time to do all the research, and you still wont find every recall that effects you directly,and it shouldn't have to be that way. It should be a lot easier on the consumer!
One day this was all brought to my attention by my uncle getting sick from eating some recalled peanut butter, that he had no idea was recalled... That's because it wasn’t recalled for an entire year! 
The day he ate it he immediately began to feel horrible and knew something wasn't right. When he went to the doctors, they had no idea what was wrong with him.. He suffered from multiple infections and other life changing symptoms that still effect him to this day, And they are taking a major tole on his life. Not just him hundreds of thousands of people across the world are in his same position, if not worse, or dead.
After becoming sick and realizing what caused it to happen, and discovering how big of an epidemic this problem really was..He then became a food advocate, inspiring many people like me and everybody here at S.T.O.P. All Recalls to pay more attention to the food we are eating. Before we even buy it, while spreading the word to everyone we could..About this silent serial killer!!
When i learned how bad this problem was, I immediately began to start thinking of a solution. I knew there had to be a better way of warning people about all these recalls, and there had to be a way to only inform the consumer of the products that they are prone to purchase, or already have purchased. Then it hit me.. What was missing was a software application!!
An app. like nothing before it, that takes each individual recall and distributes it directly to each individual affected consumer, store,  restaurant, or potential affected consumers/stores/restaurants..  This patented app., “The Direct Digital Distribution Of Life Saving Information Software Application” is unlike anything on the market because its the only one of its kind. Its designed to do one thing and one thing only..And that is to save as many lives as it possibly can.
Today, there are endless amounts of recalls being issued, that majority of the population are completely un-aware of...
This a big problem, but we have an even bigger solution to solve it!
Let me start by explaining to you how this life saving application works.. 
Picture each recall as a local news headline, if every local news headline across the country/world were all reported on the same station, and on the same website with no organization it would be completely too difficult for anyone to use efficiently.Therefore people wouldn't even bother looking.
Which is exactly what’s happening with these recalls, and has been for entirely too long. It’s time for a major change. It’s time for The S.T.O.P. All Recalls App. to be on every app. accessible electronic device possible. 
When a user first downloads this application to their electronic device(Cell phone, tablet, computer, car, etc.), they get to setup a profile containing all the items they buy, bought, or plan to buy in the future. They may also select items that they want to receive information on that someone they know might buy or own, such as their children, relatives, or pets. They can always go back and edit these selections at any time. 
The user then identifies their city, state, and most shopped at stores or locations...
When choosing what groceries, the consumer is presented with a list that breaks down food as you would find it within the grocery store. Into categories such as (Vegetables, Fruits, Seafood, Meat, Bread, Canned Goods, Rice, Oils, Dressings, Flour/Cooking Products, Peanut Butter, Cookies/Packaged Deserts, Candy, Soups, Jelly/Jams, Coffee, Condiments, Milk, Cheese, Etc.)
Keeping the selection process as simple as possible is the key to keep the consumer interested, which also keeps the consumer informed.
Each user can also go through many other lists of a huge selection of products that they may want to be notified about if there are any recalls or consumer warnings for them to.. Such as ( Medicine, Prescription Medicine, Vitamins, Automobiles, Clothing, Building Materials, Baby Products, Pet Food, Other Pet Products, Makeup/Beauty Supplies, Etc.). 
Every item will display a picture icon next to it for easier identification, and with one touch on either the name or icon, they simply add the item to their list of “Important Info I Need To Know,” and continue scrolling down. 
This makes it to where the user will receive all info. about that item.After filling out the information on their profile the users are then directed to
 “The Welcome Home Screen,” where they have access to 15 different menu's. - Important Info I Need To Know, Search All Recalls, Most Recalled Products, Deadly Disease Information, Protecting Your Pets, Diabetes Daily, Curing Cancer, All Consumer Warnings, Farm-Crop-&-Livestock, All Around The World, Restaurant Reviews, Local Weather And News,” (One local news station And one local weather station for each area.),Prescriptions & Vitamins, All Other Life Saving Info, And 24/7 Consumer Support.-Within these 15 options,they can browse through endless amounts of life saving information..

“S.T.O.P. All Recalls” is operated by our team of dedicated food safety advocates who gather all recalls, consumer warnings, and life saving information from various trusted sources throughout the entire world wide internet. 
Our team also collects information from consumers, and other trusted partners who report it directly to us. All of this information gathered from every source will be verified to make sure that it is legitimate. We then track every store, restaurant, and location that the recalled item has been, or is due to be delivered to. And inform them, but usually it is too late of a recall being issued and most of the contaminated products have already been purchased by the consumer by the time the stores can be notified, but our policy at S.T.O.P. is to tell everyone about every single recall issued including telling stores and restaurants.In order to distribute the life saving information directly to each affected user, we place all of this information into each specific affected area server folder under the individual item category. Then all users who live close to these locations or those who have selected these affected items/stores/locations as their favorites will be notified either the next time they open the app., or if they choose to receive push notifications from the app. to their device they will be alerted the second that we place the information into the database. 
This database is where all information throughout the entire application is accessed via the internet. Users can also browse through all of this information, even the recalls that they aren’t as prone to come in contact with. They can also always browse these recalls from all over within the “Search All Recalls” menu, located on the “The Welcome Home Screen.”
S.T.O.P. All Recalls will be known for our accurate reports, and the valuable life saving info. that we provide. Also our well known customer service,questions,and concerns 24 hour hot-line system will be available for consumers who need to talk to us at anytime about any questions, concerns, or reports of any recalls or consumer warnings or any life saving information that they might have for us. 
_____________________________________________________________________
Without this much needed App., products within every industry (food, auto, medication, clothing, etc.,) will unfortunately continue to see increases in recalls every year, and thats a proven fact.
There’s already laws and guidelines in place for all these industries. For now though, enforcing them isn’t on the top of our governments list of things to do. So just passing new laws won’t fix it, it has been tried too many times and proven to not make any major impacts on these food safety/product recall issues time and time again!!
That makes it up to us, the people of this fine country to take matters into our own hands. The only way to get everybody to pay attention to this issue, is to help bring it to is for us to help bring it to their attention. S.T.O.P. All Recalls works together with all the top food safety organizations, and eventually other big organizations will jump aboard and help us make sure that every single person who is alive today knows how many recalls are issued on a daily basis!! 
With this app. we will be able to save millions of lives by not only raising awareness of these issues, but eventually these manufacturers and huge companies will start taking the handling and inspection of their products way more seriously. 
They will then be forced to adapt or they will loose all of their customers as they continue to find out about their endless amount of recalls caused by their repeated poor decisions, through the info on our app. 
This App. is patent protected because we don't ever want its control to ever get into the wrong hands of anyone who may use it for the wrong reasons, or who may not take it seriously enough. We are positive that we have the prefect most fit, constant growing team of hard working food advocates that can handle running this new and improved recall system the right way.

All of you who pledge $25 and up will be one of the first people to receive our upgraded premium version of the S.T.O.P. All Recalls App. on the day it is released to the public, free of charge! (App. link will be distributed to you, via e-mail) 

Now that you are aware of this huge problem that continues to get worse day by day, you are left with two choices, 

Either you can help us S.T.O.P. the problem, Or you can accept it..
We hope you choose to walk with us.
Thank You For All Your Support!!

story:
The Back Story:

In 2006, at age 26, Matt Pearson was experiencing severe abdominal pain while working on a home renovation in Hawaii.  He went to the doctor and was told that he had a kidney infection and was prescribed antibiotics.  Over the next few days, the pain became so severe that he knew something else was wrong.  Fearing the worst, he went to New Mexico to stay with his sister for a while and seek treatment.
 
Once in New Mexico, the pain became so unbearable that Matt had to go to the emergency room.  The doctors that saw him ordered abdominal scans and scopes and it was then that he was diagnosed with agressive colon cancer.  The doctors were astounded that someone so young was being attacked by an illness normally observed in much older patients.
 
Matt had surgery to remove the tumor and most of his lower intestine and to install an ileostomy.  After radiation, his soft-tissue wounds were slow to heal and he developed a large mass of internal scar tissue in his pelvic region.  After two more major surgeries to attempt the remediation of the scar tissue, Matt began to heal and get stronger.  By this time, it was 2009.
 
During 2009 and 2010, Matt was able to work as a courier for a company in New Mexico that services veterinary clients, but he never gave up his desire to move back to Savannah.  In early 2011, Matt did make the move from New Mexico to Savannah, going to work with his primary skill set, carpentry. 
 
Very soon after his arrival back here, he began to have more severe abdominal pain...again! (It should be noted that he has lived with some pain since his first diagnosis.)  He was also beginning to have urination problems.  The doctors that he saw in Savannah found that his bladder wasn't functioning properly and they installed two nephrostomies to drain his kidneys.  They ordered more scans and determined that he now had bladder cancer.
 
The doctors consulted and decided that the best solution was the removal of his bladder and the scar tissue mass that was still present.  Matt bravely (again) underwent surgery in late 2011.  When the surgeons opened his abdominal cavity, however, they were shocked to discover that the scar tissue mass had metastasized, spreading to his pelvic bones as well.  They were not able to remove anything because of how widespread the cancer was.  They closed him up and ordered a long and strong regimen of chemotherapy.
 
After nine months of chemotherapy, Matt had lost 100 pounds and was down to only 115.  For reference, Matt is six feet tall.  After another couple of scans, the doctors determined that the cancer had not shrunk enough for another attempt at removal, and that Matt was too weak to continue chemotherapy.  Around this time, Matt began having excruciating hip pain.  He was readmitted to the hospital and doctors found cancer-related fluid was building up around his sciatic nerve and causing pressure, therefore causing the pain.
 
Doctors installed a fluid drain in his hip to try and relieve his pain, and it has worked to some degree, thank God.  After another 15 days in the hospital, Matt was discharged.  That was this past Saturday, August 18, 2012.
 

What Matt Needs Now

Matt is currently unable to work since he is still in a weakend state from chemotherapy and cancer.  He receives a very small amount of government assistance and some help from family and friends, but it just is not enough for his medicine, rent, utilities, vehicle insurance, food, new glasses, etc.  He needs a few new clothes since all his old ones are twice his size now.  The list goes on, but you get the idea.


Why This Is Written in the Third Person

Matt is fiercly independent, and is very reluctant to ask anyone for help.  He would rather swim in misery than intrude on anyone.  While this is a very noble trait, it is to the point now where we as loving human beings can't let him do this so independently any more.  After much deliberation and humbling conversation, Matt agreed to let me launch a campaign on his behalf.
 

What You Can Do

Obviously, a small monetary donation would be a great blessing to Matt, but besides that, a prayer or a comment of well-wishing for Matt on this campaign page would certainly brighten his day.  Also, please share this with as many people as you can.  If this campaign is able to build momentum, it will help a wonderful, generous, beautiful person live in relative comfort.  Please be sure to share using the tools under Matt's picture.  Thank you for reading.

story:
Eventhea was conceived for two very simple reasons:

1. My family got tired of watching the news on Monday morning and seeing all the cool stuff that occurred over the weekend that we were oblivious to. With Eventhea, anyone can go on and see local events not only for their area, but also for anywhere they may be headed to…

2. We found that there is a lack of organized sharing on the internet that does not involve friends. I wanted to easily find content for specific events all in one place.

Here’s what I’m talking about: A couple of years ago I took my family to Disney World for their annual Halloween party. That night, I took a video of my 5 year old son dancing with Goofy and another little girl. After a few minutes the girl’s mother came up to me crying her eyes out because her camera had run out of batteries and she missed pretty much the entire moment.

She asked me for a copy of the video and even though I was happy to give it to her, we both realized we had a problem. How would I get it to her? Friend her on Facebook? I really don’t want to friend this stranger. Youtube or some other sharing site? Good luck finding it. Email? File is too large.

Eventhea was born. We have a feed for national events, that’s easy enough. We are building an API that will allow anyone to submit their feed to Eventhea for inclusion. We are also manually building feeds for event providers in the larger markets.

Events can be anything! Concerts, sports, fund raising, environmental… ANYTHING!

The idea is that people can find, create and contributing content to events. Basically, it's an event-based social networking site.

There are no fees to use Eventhea, including creating events. It is 100% free to all users! 

A great feature that really sets us apart is our Event Slider. You can choose your event categories, date range and region and view your chosen events similar to how you see weather forecasts on the news. Think of the oil spill in Louisiana. Users can create an event for their specific spill and using the slider, viewers can see the spill unfold as it really happened.

We have several items we want to expand upon:

1. Move to a SQL database. We have outgrown our proof-of-concept site.

2. MORE POWER! Speed costs money…

3. Renovate and simplify the Slider and search. This includes eliminating the date range and simply having +/- buttons for the dates.

4. Add more local events.

This round of funding will go towards as much as we can to get the site finished!

At the end of the day, Eventhea’s goal is to have EVERY event WORLD-WIDE listed on our site and allow users to post their own content. You want to see videos from the Christmas Art Walk in South Beach, go to Eventhea!

We are not some large company. We are a few passionate, dedicated individuals doing the best we can to realize our vision. We have raised some money, which allowed us to develop what we currently have as well as pay for licensing for stuff like geo-tagging and the Google map. None of us have taken any kind of payment or salary and we have all contributed our own hardware to this venture. Any money we raise will go 100% towards bettering the site. I believe in this site so much that my family is making many sacrifices to pay the huge hosting bill each month…

If you wish to really help us out and invest, please contact me ASAP!

With your help, we can realize our dream of building a beautiful site for the people, by the people! Please support us and be part of something great!

story:
Here at the University of Dallas in the Human Performance Lab we are conducting a long-term biomechanical study of gait stability, working toward our goal of fall prevention in the elderly. Our current project involves the use of state of the art technology, including four Inertial Measurement Units (IMUs) and eight Electromyography (EMG) devices which range in cost from $500 to $1,400 each. The IMUs are used to measure acceleration and rotation and the EMGs are used to measure electrical activity in the muscles. In addition to the ten devices which are placed on the legs of research participants, our study requires that we have multiple advanced laptop computers, a high-speed camera and the necessary software in order to obtain viable data to analyze. These technological expenses are added on top of those associated with paying for research participants and assistants. For example, each participant is provided with a pair of boots for consistency in testing. As a small university we have limited funds for scientific research and rely heavily on external funding.

      Although we have the equipment and resources that we need to conduct our study on a small scale, we will require a great deal more equipment and funding in order to expand the study from twelve participants to over one hundred. The increased size of the test group will validate our results, allowing us to develop a more advanced fall prevention device that has greater applicability. This proposed device will be superior to existing fall alert systems because it not only functions retroactively but also preventatively. The device will be worn around the waist as a belt and linked to a central computer in order to record the movements of the wearer and indicate where his or her instabilities lie. For example, instability may frequently arise when the individual moves between rooms with different flooring. The system will be equipped with an alarm that warns when the wearer's stability is compromised. These features will help the individual move more safely. If a fall should occur, the central computer will be linked to emergency medical services (EMS). Not only will it alert EMS, but also provide them with detailed information about the nature of the fall including how hard the fall was, the direction, and whether there was movement after the fall. This technology can not only be applied to the elderly, but also to those with neuromuscular disorders.

            If you have had any family or friends suffer from a fall, then you realize how important this research is.Thank you for taking the time to watch our video and learn more about our research. Any contributions you are able to make will be greatly appreciated. We realize not everyone can contribute, but you can still help by sharing the link to get the word out.

Our current project involves the use of state of the art technology, including four Inertial Measurement Units (IMUs) and eight Electromyography (EMG) devices which range in cost from $500 to $1,400 each. The IMUs are used to measure acceleration and rotation and the EMGs are used to measure electrical activity in the muscles. In addition to the ten devices which are placed on the legs of research participants, our study requires that we have multiple advanced laptop computers, a high-speed camera and the necessary software in order to obtain viable data to analyze. These technological expenses are added on top of those associated with paying for research participants and assistants. For example, each participant is provided with a pair of boots for consistency in testing. As a small university we have limited funds for scientific research and rely heavily on external funding.
      Although we have the equipment and resources that we need to conduct our study on a small scale, we will require a great deal more equipment and funding in order to expand the study from twelve participants to over one hundred. The increased size of the test group will validate our results, allowing us to develop a more advanced fall prevention device that has greater applicability. This proposed device will be superior to existing fall alert systems because it not only functions retroactively but also preventatively. The device will be worn around the waist as a belt and linked to a central computer in order to record the movements of the wearer and indicate where his or her instabilities lie. For example, instability may frequently arise when the individual moves between rooms with different flooring. The system will be equipped with an alarm that warns when the wearer's stability is compromised. These features will help the individual move more safely. If a fall should occur, the central computer will be linked to emergency medical services (EMS). Not only will it alert EMS, but also provide them with detailed information about the nature of the fall including how hard the fall was, the direction, and whether there was movement after the fall. This technology can not only be applied to the elderly, but also to those with neuromuscular disorders.
            If you have had any family or friends suffer from a fall, then you realize how important this research is.Thank you for taking the time to watch our video and learn more about our research. Any contributions you are able to make will be greatly appreciated. We realize not everyone can contribute, but you can still help by sharing the link to get the word out.

story:
On January 19, 2011, I suffered a foot fracture while working, as a flight attendant, for a charter airline that flies our U.S. (and British) soldiers between bases around the world. The fracture was not found until almost 2 months later, which complicated the healing process. I was on sick leave (in a cast and on crutches) for almost half of last year. That is when I began to fall behind on my mortgage. Fortunately, I had enough savings to keep my head above water for most of that time. Approximately one month after returning to work, I suffered my first ever grand mal seizure just before one of our flights out of Limerick, Ireland. Needless to say, I went right back on sick leave. I was informed that if I was diagnosed with epilepsy, I could not work as a flight attendant again. One month later, I suffered another seizure (at home). Two weeks after that, I was terminated. On December 7, 2011, I awoke on my bathroom floor cut and bleeding in various places from yet another seizure. I was diagnosed with epilepsy the next day.

 

In the state of Georgia, I am not allowed to drive within 6 months of a seizure. I live alone, and have no family any closer than Wisconsin. Without insurance, I am left to pay out-of-pocket for my own medicines and doctor visits with the $173/week that I receive from unemployment (Thank God!), which will be running out within the next month or two. My medicines cost $200 this month. And, since I have no children, I do not qualify for any type of free health insurance. My home was scheduled for foreclosure March 6th, however, the mortgage company lowered my payment and agreed to give me a trial period. My mortgage is now $548.00 per month. As you can imagine, I am not able to cover my mortgage and utilities on my current income. My car insurance and cell phone (which I need to call 911 if I hurt myself during a seizure) have been cut off. And, I fear that my electricity (my home is all electric) and other utilities will be next. My family has helped with that they have, but they have informed me that they do not have much more to give. I apply for work-from-home jobs each day, but have yet to be hired. Some say my computer software is too old, which disqualifies me.

 

I have a post graduate education, have studied at universities around the world, and possess many other skills. My teaching certificate for grades Prek-12 (6-12 English only) is still current, as well. And, I have applied and sent my resume to every online school I know. I have a strong desire to work and make my own income so the insults from my family will stop. Without being able to drive, finding a job is more than difficult. Being only 31, single with no children puts me on the bottom of the list for government agencies that offer aid. I need help.

 

Currently, my foot fracture is still causing me pain. I have a cane and cushioned boot that sometimes help. I am also going to physical therapy for my foot, in hope that the pain will heal and my work options will not be limited by this. Fortunately, this care is covered by workers’ compensation. This does not, however, cover any other expense. Since I continue to have seizures, my medical expenses are taking a huge toll on me, also.

 

I proudly purchased my home at 24yrs old. My interest rate is now just over 3%, and my monthly payments are less than most apartment rent. At times, I may seize and lose consciousness when I stand, my foot may hurt when I walk. But, at the very least, I would love to keep the place where I can lie and rest my head.

 

In summary, please help me get the medical treatment I need, and save my home.

story:
Our Story


In 2006, David Lyons was hospitalized and

diagnosed with Multiple Sclerosis at the age of 47. David, a former bodybuilder and health club owner, exercised regularly and lived a healthy
lifestyle. He was devastated by the diagnosis and frustrated by the physical limitations of his
condition. His initial MS attack left him with partial paralysis, tightness, pain and numbness
in his extremities and back. These common symptoms of MS come and go without warning.
The multiple lesions in Davidâ€™s spinal cord make it difficult for him to coordinate movements and they affect his balance. The lesions in his brain cause cognitive problems affecting his concentration. And the lesion by his optic nerve, at times, causes vision impairment and blackness when seeing out of his left eye. David also lives in a constant state of fatigue caused by this disease attacking his nervous system.

While in the hospital the doctors told David he would most likely leave in a wheelchair and
would not return to his normal workout routine. They also warned him that MS is a disease
that most often progressively worsens and to prepare for his limitations as he ages.

So what does David do? Give up and sink into depression? Grab a walker to steady
himself? Retreat to bed to conserve his strength?

NO...AT THE AGE OF 50 DAVID LYONS DECIDED TO COMPETE
IN A NPC BODYBUILDING COMPETITION!

David knew he could not do this alone, so he assembled a team he calls The Challenge Team. Putting this team together was no easy task. David needed dedicated, talented experts on his side to make this challenge a reality.

David is a courageous man who has rallied the support of many who know what he faces.
Davidâ€™s doctors all told him that his pursuit of a bodybuilding title was sheer madness,
especially at 50 years old...but if anyone could do it - he could. Davidâ€™s team is behind him
100% and they are pushing him all the way.

On August 22, 2009, David competed in his first competition where he was awarded an
impressive trophy for THE MOST INSPIRATIONAL BODYBUILDER!

David Lyons will keep competing, beat this disease and will not give up his dream. As David states, â€œThe two most important people in my life during The MS Bodybuilding Challenge will always be my wife, Kendra, who gives up her husband while I train and diet for these events and is willing to keep doing it until I retire (which, wonâ€™t be in the near future!). She is an inspiration to me as she has the compassion to deal with sick people all day as a nurse and then come home to help me shows the heart of a rare woman and a true blessing.

And God who, without His grace, love and strength, I could have never made it out of the hospital and on to that stage in 2009 and onto others. It is never by my might or power but by His will that I push forward.

"I might never win a bodybuilding contest with multiple sclerosis but I will win the
battle against MS.

This is not about me winning contests, it's about motivating other MS patients
to take control of their lives, get fit and beat the odds in every way possible. Not
everyone has to compete in a contest to win. You win by just getting up and
fighting.

People assume that, if I could change my outcome in life, I would rather be
healthy again and not have MS. The fact is that if I didn't have MS I would not be
here today inspiring others and helping change lives. So, don't assume I would

rather not have MS. These are the cards I've been dealt and I accept this fate, I
would not change it and I will continue to make a difference until the day I die.

We all have a choice, no matter what trials we face, to either lay down and lose
or challenge the obstacles ahead and win. I choose to win. I encourage you to do
the same." -David Lyons


The Impact

The MS Bodybuilding Challenge (MSBC) is more than the founder, David Lyonsâ€™, battle to

beat multiple sclerosis. It is a challenge for all those that have this disease and others to take charge of their lives, get fit and battle like a warrior.

The MSBC is dedicated to helping others fight and win by educating and inspiring MS patients and their families. We are passionate about empowering the MS community through health & fitness. Through events such as Mike Torchiaâ€™s Shape Up America/NBCâ€™s 4 Your Health Expo and our vision of working hand in hand with MS patients across the nation, The MSBC will reach millions of people and help change lives.

Our fundraiser, The MS Fitness Challenge, enables The MSBC to bring Certified Fitness
Trainers into the homes of MS patients, free of cost, and coach both patient and family
members how to fight this disease through health & fitness.

David, the President and Executive Producer with Andrew Bishop, CEO and Executive Producer of Bishop-Lyons Entertainment (BLE) have a feel for Hollywood and a desire for publicity. Bishop- Lyons Entertainment director and filmmaker John Spagnola has taken the reigns as he films Davidâ€™s daily life struggle with MS and his grueling workouts in the gym. BLE plans to use this footage to convince millions around the world that anyone with an intense enough desire can overcome even the most catastrophic challenge. In addition, David is writing a book which will be published as the companion to the film and will bring it to market.

What We Need & What You Get


To further help in the fight against MS, David is working hand-in-hand with the National Multiple Sclerosis Society. A portion of your sponsorship dollars will be donated to the National MS Society to help multiple sclerosis patients by supporting research into its cause and cure.

The MS Bodybuilding Challenge is not just a journey of one man beating multiple sclerosis...itâ€™s a celebration of life. Dreams Do Come True... Be Part Of The Dream!


Principal Sponsor
Principal Sponsor
$25,000+


  1. * Appearance or interview in film (MSBC determines) 

  2. * Personal paragraph in book in sponsor credits page

  3. * Product placement in film or t-shirt ad during filming

  4. * Banner ad on MSBC website

  5. * Promotion on radio and/or TV appearances whenever possible


Supporting Sponsor
$10,000 - $24,999


  1. * Product placement in film or t-shirt ad during filming

  2. * Banner ad on MSBC website

  3. * Mention in book in sponsor credits

  4. * Mention in film in sponsor credits

  5. * Promotion on radio and/or TV appearances whenever possible


Contributing Sponsor
$5,000 - $9,999


  1. * Banner ad on MSBC website

  2. * Mention in book in sponsor credits

  3. * Mention in film in sponsor credits

  4. * Promotion on radio and/or TV appearances whenever possible


Founding Sponsor
Less than $5,000


  1. * Mention on website, film, and book in sponsor credits

  2. * Link to your website if a business sponsor


Your support is appreciated and will publicized at every opportunity but most importantly, you will be supporting a heroic project that brings hope and inspiration to those who suffer from MS - a catastrophic disease.

Other Ways You Can Help

You can sponsor David in his next bodybuilding contest or help The MS Fitness Challenge by contacting us at www.themsbodybuildingchallenge.com OR by calling (818) 284-2080 to find out more.

story:
Hello,

  My name is George.  I am a 52 year old man who needs to have life saving weight loss surgery.  I do have health insurance, but they will not cover the cost.  It will cost around $20,000 for the surgery, the balance of the money will be used to save my house, which is up for foreclosure in July, and be able to maintain my family during recovery period.  I have tried to find many other areas to help, from free surgery, to clinical trials.  Nothing. Obesity is a diasease. I have been diagnosed with cornary artery disease (three stents placed), diabetes (three shots per day), high blood pressure, atrial fibulation, high cholesterol, sleep apnea. This surgery is not a cure all, but is a great start. My family needs me, my grand children need me, my great grand children need me and most of all, my wife needs me. I too need all of them.  I do not want to die so young.  I ask for your help.

Thank you,

George

Thank you,
George

story:
Our Story

Hello. My name is Eva Usadi and I am the Founder and Director of Trauma and Resiliency Resources, Inc. and the daughter of a U.S. Army Signal Corps Veteran. Here is my story:javascript:nicTemp();

 

I am a trauma specialist and have been working with veterans for a long time. Warrior Camp has been carefully designed to address combat-related PTSD in an active duty military population. Future Warrior Camps will be held to address Military Sexual Trauma, Family Reintegration, and Vietnam Veterans.

The Impact

The goal of TRR's Warrior Camp campaign is to enable us to hold our pilot Camp this coming summer and heal the trauma of war for 12 selected Active Duty Military members. Without this treatment, which we know to be effective, these warriors will likely continue to suffer from PTSD, and be at high risk for suicide.

What We Need & What You Get

What we need is to complete our goal of raising $60,000 to fund the pilot Warrior Camp. All of this money goes to pay for food, lodging, arena fees and clinical services for 12 active duty warriors from Warriors in Transition Units (WTUs) - this comes to $5,000 per warrior for the initial camp. There will be 8 clinical staff involved in this very intensive treatment program. We also need to pay for a videographer and a research team to compile data.  The cost is high for this first Camp because we do not yet own our own facility, which is the ultimate goal so that we can run Camps year round. If we are not able to reach this goal by the deadline, we will continue to fundraise until we can fund the Camp. None of the money raised goes to anything else. We have no paid staff.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

You can help us by contributing what you are able - and also by spreading the word. Every dollar counts and will save a life.

story:
Short Summary

Long story short. My mum is a wheelchair user. I have to use a walking stick to get about(and have arm and joint problems) and my sister has a damaged knee and her back is bad from having to lift my mum about.

We can't get help from social services with care because they say we should do it and the hoist they're offering is one I can't use due to my own disabilities and I don't want my sister to be stuck caring for my mum full time.

We've found a hoist that I can use and best of all it's portable so we can use it in the house and even take it on holiday with us! It's just more expensive than we can afford as my mum is supporting both my sister and me at the moment and she doesn't earn a lot.

My mum's just been diagnosed with breast cancer and they're both feeling pretty down at the moment so I'd love to be able to give them some good news hope you can help us do it!

What We Need

We're looking for £2000 (about $3200) which will allow us to get the hoist we need (£1400) plus the slings for it (£200), delivery/set up costs and indiegogo's fee.
 
Anything we get over what we need will be going to the charity my mum works for (Disability Law Service) which offers legal advice and support to disabled people in the UK check them out here www.dls.org.uk

The Impact

Having this hoist would make a massive difference as it would allow my sister to be able to go away by herself (currently she can't because I can't look after my mum by myself) it would also help make sure neither of us injure ourselves lifting my mum as well as being much safer for my mum as she wouldn't be at risk of falling/being dropped. There's also the fact that my mum has just been diagnosed with breast cancer and the treatment for that is likely to make her feel tired and ill as well as possbly restricting her ability to move her arms which will make the way we move her now an impossibility.

THANKS!!!

Every single penny will help us out. it's not a fashionable cause or a life saving one but it will make the lives of 3 people a bit easier and more bearable so please donate and spread the word.

story:
Our Story

Hi, we are Nick and Annabel from Australia and we have been married for 7 years. For about 5 years we have been trying to have children but we are unable to naturally due to Annabel being born without a womb. She found this out when she was just 17. We have known each other a long time before we got married and i knew about Annabel's condition right from the start. We married in the year 2005 and we knew that starting a family was going to be hard not just physically but mentally and financialy but if you want something bad enough you will try everything to get it. We knew other than adoption which we are already on the list and waiting that surrogacy was possible as Annabel still produces eggs. We have tried 6 times in Australia with a friend but all attempts have been unsuccessful. We have spent so much money, all our savings and this is really our last hope of having our own child. We have decided to go to India where we will undergo surrogacy with 2 surrogates. We desperately want to start a family  as we have so much love to give a child. We have been through so much and it has only made our love for each other stronger. We are both so strong and really need some help so please help us.


The Impact

We hope to achieve success in India and we also want our own country to make surrogacy easier. The rights of the parents in Australia are tricky and it is so expensive. Not to mention the laws of surrogacy it is so hard and strict people that want to help us cant as they have to meet the laws of it all it is just so hard.


What We Need & What You Get

We actually need $30,000 for our Indian surrogacy but anything would help us. We need to pay $5,000 upfront and the rest is paid when the surrogate gets pregnant. We also need to pay for airfares and accommodation which is 16 days on our first visit and 3 weeks when the child is born.


Other Ways You Can Help

We know there are other couples out there wanting to do what we are attempting to do, and we need help from our health funds or government especially when it is no fault of our own. Annabel has a medical condition which we cannot fix, so this is it.

story:
What the funds are for

DBS trades under a compliant DA, but at times, makes noise beyond the accepted council limits after 6pm. Part of powerlifting is metal plates make noise, and lowering deadlifts isn't the quietest thing.

In our 18 months of trade, we've received two complaints about noise. We moved dead back downstairs so there will be no more.

What your funds can do

In order to continue trade, we need to

  • File the relevant forms with council, along with fees, until the change in noise level is accepted, or we move
  • If you could find a place, move straight away

 

The Support

Given we can't predict the outcome of council dealings, or finding a new premise, we're hoping our merchandise is sufficient trade off for your support.

Each contribution gets you a shirt. Grab from the rack on the gym. If you are outside the gym, whatever we can find in your size.

Shirt styles for perks can be seen here: http://dbsbarbell.bigcartel.com/

 

Risks & Challenges

We could get screwed. Council could give us a notice during the process, owner could react to the noise complaint, we might not find a new premise, lots of things could happen that are out of our control.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you know a cross-fit gym or other gym that wants a co-tenant, let us know. If you know some industrial estate - let us know!

story:
*TrackR is not associated with or endorsed by any other company that makes tracking devices.

See What People are Saying About TrackR atlas

 

We put our product to the test and had one couple try it out to see just how helpful the TrackR atlas is.

 

 

Whether it's a favorite toy, passport, or your trusty hammer, attaching a TrackR bravo or any Bluetooth tracking device to your item allows atlas to help you find anything in your home. The TrackR bravo was originally designed to be an item-locator, and it now works cohesively with atlas to keep your home effortlessly organized. Find out more about TrackR bravo here.

 

 

Compatible in the following countries wall outlets: Albania, Australia, Austria, Belarus, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Brazil, Bulgaria, Canada, Caribbean, Chile, Colombia, Croatia, Denmark, Ecuador, Estonia, Fiji, Finland, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Indonesia, Iran, Italy, Japan, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Republic of Macedonia, Mexico, Republic of Moldova, the Netherlands, New Zealand, Norway, Pakistan, Panama, Papua New Guinea, Philippines, Portugal, Romania, Russia, Saudi Arabia, Serbia, Slovenia, Solomon Islands, South Korea, Spain, Sweden, Taiwan, Tonga, Turkey, Ukraine, United Kingdom, United States, Uruguay, and Venezuela.

About The Technology

TrackR atlas enables room-based item monitoring through several key technologies.  The TrackR atlas utilizes both Wi-Fi and Bluetooth Low Energy radios to detect the presence of items that have TrackR devices or other Bluetooth-based trackers attached to them.  By connecting to your home Wi-Fi network, your items' locations are reported to our server, which can then be securely downloaded to your phone via the TrackR app.

TrackR atlas enables voice-based search through the Amazon Alexa technology. In the future, TrackR will continue to add other voice-based search technologies such as Google Now and Siri as they become available to 3rd party integrations.

We respect your privacy, and you will have the option for your atlas device to help detect other TrackR users' items or just your own.  Only you will be able to modify your TrackR atlas settings and retrieve your items' location information.

Timeline

TrackR atlas is currently in development, as we continue to test and improve the technology. As many of you know, crowd-funded projects can experience delays, and we will continue to keep in contact with you if delays occur. We have already launched 3 crowd-funded products to market and have always been able to deliver our products to backers (although sometimes they can take a little longer than expected).  Our team will make sure to keep in touch with you throughout the process, and if necessary, you can cancel and get your money back at any time. 

 

We Would Love to Hear From You!

Chris and Christian started TrackR in 2009 after almost losing their car to the Pacific Ocean because they couldn’t find their car keys. Since that time, TrackR has gone on to sell over a half million TrackR devices and is ranked as #155 on Inc 500 list.  You can reach out to the team here: Support@theTrackR.com or chat with us by joining the TrackR Insiders Club. (See details below!)

Please let us know if you have any questions, comments or suggestions!

Email Support at AtlasVIP@theTrackR.com

Send us a tweet: @TheTrackR

Contact Chris on Twitter: @CGherb

(Quick note: I love hearing from backers; Twitter is preferred to email. If you need to email me, Cc: Support as I often miss emails. chris (at) thetrackr (dot) com)

For inquiries regarding Distribution, Retail and Partnerships please apply at: http://www.theTrackR.com/partners

FAQ

Can I receive the TrackR bravo devices that come with my package first?

Yes, we can ship the TrackR bravo units immediately after the campaign finishes.

 

Will this work with my Amazon echo?

Yes! It will work with any Amazon Alexa enabled service like echo, Amazon TV, and more!  It works on both iOS and Android phones.
