story:
Try picturing life without Uber, Google and Amazon (who said Tinder?). Kind of hard: wireless technology is amazing, and it has truly changed the way we lived over the past few years.

However, you’ve probably heard how a number of major scientific institutions around the world have raised alarms over the harmful effects of wireless radiation on our health. Over the last years, male fertility has been on the decline, and testicle cancer is one of the most frequent cancers of young men. If the debate on radiation is still opened, the Cleveland Clinic - the country’s leading center for clinical research in male fertility - found that men who keep their phones in their pocket for more than 4 hours per day experience a 50% reduction in sperm count!

Here at SPARTAN, we didn’t want to this to threaten our modern life. We want to keep using technology without changing any of our habits. That’s why we have created the Faraday Boxers.

The Faraday Boxer is the boxer of the future. For the first time, we are bringing together design with innovation to create Faraday underwear that shields your family jewels from wireless radiation.


You just have to put on your comfy Faraday underwear in the morning to happily use your smartphone, tablet and computer with all the peace of mind of knowing your manhood and most important assets are safe.

We’re bringing to underwear the same advanced technology used in space suits (no kidding!). We developed a unique high-tech fabric by incorporating pure silver fibers within the cotton of the boxer.

The silver acts as a Faraday cage, which prevents radiation from reaching your cherries. Our special fabric has been tested in an independent lab and we block over 99% of all cellphone and Wi-Fi radiation.

The hard part was to manage to integrate the Silver Fiber in the cotton of the faraday boxer without losing elasticity or creating a rigid fabric. We wanted to shield our little soldiers, but definitely not to wear armor. It took use months of work and hundreds of prototypes and different fabrics to get it just right, but we finally manage to create a fabric that is just as comfortable as your regular pair of undies.

The good news is that the silver it contains also makes SPARTAN's Faraday Boxers naturally anti-bacterial, so you and your downstairs area stay fresh at the end of the day. Stinky undies are already part of the past.

We know you want the best for your crown jewels. We sure do. That’s why we chose to design our boxers in the Fashion Capital of the world: Paris, France.

Our stylists have been working with one clear goal in mind: surpass the level of comfort and style of the best undergarment already out there.

With SPARTAN, we are truly raising the standard of male undergarment with high-quality French design for optimal comfort and an exceptional fit.

We have our final prototypes, and our manufacturers are ready to get started. But in order to do this, we need to produce upfront. We cannot do this without you.

We will start the production batch as soon as the campaign is over and will begin shipping your SPARTAN's Faraday Boxers as soon as February 2016!

For the next few days, you have the opportunity to take part in the SPARTAN project and help us save humanity with Faraday Boxers. For the occasion, we have created a special price to help you get our boxers for yourself or your loved ones.

The more boxers you buy, the more you save! 

The more people we can reach, the more success we can drum up together.

To thank you for your help in getting the word out, we are giving away 5 packs of 3 SPARTAN's Faraday Boxers. Simply share the campaign on the social media and send us the link to your publication to giveway@spartanboxers.co. We will randomly draw the 5 winners out of the participants at the end of the campaign. Each different link (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram...) counts as a different entry, so be sure to share the campaign as widely as possible!

We also share our newest actualities and create giveaway contests from time to time, so be sure to keep an eye out! 

We are a young startup passionate about health and technology.

Concerned by the impact of cellphone and wifi radiation, we wanted to create a stylish faraday boxer to keep using all of the technology available and stay safe. We’ve been working day and night for months to bring you the best and safest undergarment to protect your package.

Our ambition: raise the standard of men underwear and make those super Faraday Boxers mainstream!

Any pledge amount brings us one step closer to our goal. From all of us at Spartan, THANK YOU so much for your help!

story:
Jacq Hernandez, our friend, is a talented photographer whose work has been published by numerous media outlets including the Associate Press, Agence France Presse, Marianas Variety, Saipan Tribune, and Manila Bulletin, where she currently works.

Jacq was recently diagnosed with Stage 2 breast cancer. Her condition is curable, but only with aggressive (and expensive) treatment. She is facing a mountain of medical bills and she needs all the help she can get. 

Our hope is to raise funds to cover some of her costs so Jacq can worry less about paying bills and focus more on getting better. We want her back out in the field with her camera as quickly as possible. Check out her work and see why.


Other Ways You Can Help

  • Donate by Direct Deposit
    Bank: Union Bank-Bacoor Branch
    Account Name: Jacqueline Hernandez
    Account Type: Savings
    Account Number: 109453171382
  • Benefit Event: Purchase a piece of Jacq's work at a fundraising event on November 29. Click here for more details.

story:
Find the Smart Water Bottle PRESS KIT here 

 

 

As little as 2% loss of our bodies’ water content begins to cause the brain to lose alertness and the body to feel tired.

Drinking water is one of those simple daily routines that we forget about too often. And while most recommendations focus on how much water we need to drink, not enough is said about how often you should be sipping on your water. The frequency and even distribution of your water intake during the day is actually the key to preventing dehydration.   

The new EQUA Smart Water Bottle is here to take your water intake – and overall wellbeing – to the next level.

 

 

 

It glows every time you need to take a sip of water  

Once you’re thirsty it’s already too late. EQUA will make sure to send you regular reminders every time its needed in order to prevent your dehydration.

 

 

Knows your optimal daily water intake

You’re an individual and you need a personalised plan for your optimal water intake. EQUA’s APP will do that for you and become your healthy lifestyle coach.

 

 

Tracks how much water you had

Once you start following your water intake you’ll find that on the days when you reach your daily goal, you’ll feel more energised and more friends will comment on your glowing skin.

 

 

Communicates with you, even without the use of your phone

A gentle tap on the bottle will reveal how well you are doing - with a slow glow if you’re on track or a quick glow if you need to catch up.

 

 

 

 

A companion mobile app for the EQUA Smart Water Bottle will help you keep close track of your hydration. The app recommends your daily water intake according to your body characteristics and lifestyle. It tracks your water intake and offers you an insight look in your hydration habits and analytics. You can also control the frequency of glow reminders on the bottle that will remind you when you need a sip of water.

 

 

Combining smart technology with a sleek, attractive design, EQUA is crafted in three color options: Snow White, Dark Grey and Pink Blush.

 

 

 

Using EQUA bottle will not only have an amazing impact on your wellbeing, but will drastically improve your environmental impact. While bottled waters are conveniently available at our every step, too often we’re not aware of the scary fact that plastic has been mass produced only since 1950’s but we already have a mere 9.2 billion tons of plastic waste to deal with. A switch from disposable to reusable water bottle is a simple step with a big impact!

 

 

 

 

 

There are many possibilities how to measure your water intake with the help of the bottle and the app. For us the real challenge was to build the right technology with the best user experience. Our goal was to make the hardware part small, durable, functional and packed in a beautiful design. Our choice of technology was the motion sensor (accelerometer). The accelerometer is able to recognize your movements and calculate the amount of water you drink.

 

How it works?

 

The main innovation is in its software. We have developed a clever algorithm to understand specific bottle movements. We then use machine learning technology to translate these movements into useful data. This means that the bottle and the app will improve its accuracy through time and through use.

 

Behind the scene

 

EQUA bottle contains some very smart electronic parts which unfortunately can sometimes come with a bug :( For those cases, we offer a 1 year limited warranty! Which means we’re giving you enough time to let us know if your bottle arrived with a factory mistake. Our team will do our best to assist your case in the shortest time possible with as little fuss as possible.

 

 

 

 

It's a great pleasure working and creating with such a great team.

Product designer: Darja Osojnik; UX designer: Maja Repotocnik; Art director: Anja Secnik; Graphic designers: Petra Ogrin, Manca Mencin, Petra Hertl; Chief business development officer: Helena Felc Zveplan; Production manager: Domen Lavric; Marketing team: Alja Bitenc, Lara Oven and Maja Vejnovic; Customer happiness team: Saska Bagari, Martina Humar, Andrea Negoescu, Leja Sirola and more than 10 other team members that made this project possible. You guys are the best! 

We also couldn't have done it without the support of our friends. A special thank you goes to: Borut Kumperscak - development, Jure Jazbec - hardware development, Izidor Makuc - firmware development, Jani Mahne (Izstop) - software development, Bright Visuals - video production, Jaka Birsa - photography, Mak Kordic and CNJ team – app UX design.

Thank you!

Anze Miklavec and Stella Korosec, Co-founders 

 

 

Risks and challenges

We’re a team of young, motivated minds breathing the creative spirit and drinking gallons of water. Our philosophy is to create for your better future and love every moment of it.

In the past 4 years our team has already successfully funded and delivered 3 Kickstarter campaigns: GOAT MUG, GINA and EQUA Smart Water Bottle and 1 Indiegogo campaign: GINA. Supported by more than 17,500 backers and raising more than $1,5 million in total, we’re now back, more experienced and skilled.

EQUA has been on the market for 8 years already. We’ve presented several different custom made water bottles in the past and we have hundreds of thousands of happy users worldwide. We’ve listened to all of your feedback, went deep into understanding the experience of staying hydrated and feeling good of our customers and combined it with the latest technology. We believe the new EQUA Smart Water Bottle is the ultimate best answer for the needs of anyone even remotely interested in having a healthy body and feeling good in their skin.

With years of experience in product design, product testing, production and logistics we are confident that we can deliver a perfect water bottle to you based on the timeline defined in our campaign. We already have a first sample set of bottles from our production company which are being tested by selected users all over the world as we speak.

Don’t let thirst come first. Get your EQUA today for an amazing early bird price and have the privilege to be among the first to experience the future of hydration.

The app recommends your daily water intake according to your body characteristics and lifestyle. It tracks your water intake and offers you an insight look in your hydration habits and analytics. You can also control the frequency of glow reminders on the bottle that will remind you when you need a sip of water.   Combining smart technology with a sleek, attractive design, EQUA is crafted in three color options: Snow White, Dark Grey and Pink Blush.   Using EQUA bottle will not only have an amazing impact on your wellbeing, but will drastically improve your environmental impact. While bottled waters are conveniently available at our every step, too often we’re not aware of the scary fact that plastic has been mass produced only since 1950’s but we already have a mere 9.2 billion tons of plastic waste to deal with. A switch from disposable to reusable water bottle is a simple step with a big impact!     There are many possibilities how to measure your water intake with the help of the bottle and the app. For us the real challenge was to build the right technology with the best user experience. Our goal was to make the hardware part small, durable, functional and packed in a beautiful design. Our choice of technology was the motion sensor (accelerometer). The accelerometer is able to recognize your movements and calculate the amount of water you drink. How it works? The main innovation is in its software. We have developed a clever algorithm to understand specific bottle movements. We then use machine learning technology to translate these movements into useful data. This means that the bottle and the app will improve its accuracy through time and through use. Behind the scene EQUA bottle contains some very smart electronic parts which unfortunately can sometimes come with a bug :( For those cases, we offer a 1 year limited warranty! Which means we’re giving you enough time to let us know if your bottle arrived with a factory mistake. Our team will do our best to assist your case in the shortest time possible with as little fuss as possible.    It's a great pleasure working and creating with such a great team.Product designer: Darja Osojnik; UX designer: Maja Repotocnik; Art director: Anja Secnik; Graphic designers: Petra Ogrin, Manca Mencin, Petra Hertl; Chief business development officer: Helena Felc Zveplan; Production manager: Domen Lavric; Marketing team: Alja Bitenc, Lara Oven and Maja Vejnovic; Customer happiness team: Saska Bagari, Martina Humar, Andrea Negoescu, Leja Sirola and more than 10 other team members that made this project possible. You guys are the best! We also couldn't have done it without the support of our friends. A special thank you goes to: Borut Kumperscak - development, Jure Jazbec - hardware development, Izidor Makuc - firmware development, Jani Mahne (Izstop) - software development, Bright Visuals - video production, Jaka Birsa - photography, Mak Kordic and CNJ team – app UX design.Thank you!Anze Miklavec and Stella Korosec, Co-founders    Risks and challengesWe’re a team of young, motivated minds breathing the creative spirit and drinking gallons of water. Our philosophy is to create for your better future and love every moment of it.In the past 4 years our team has already successfully funded and delivered 3 Kickstarter campaigns: GOAT MUG, GINA and EQUA Smart Water Bottle and 1 Indiegogo campaign: GINA. Supported by more than 17,500 backers and raising more than $1,5 million in total, we’re now back, more experienced and skilled.EQUA has been on the market for 8 years already. We’ve presented several different custom made water bottles in the past and we have hundreds of thousands of happy users worldwide. We’ve listened to all of your feedback, went deep into understanding the experience of staying hydrated and feeling good of our customers and combined it with the latest technology. We believe the new EQUA Smart Water Bottle is the ultimate best answer for the needs of anyone even remotely interested in having a healthy body and feeling good in their skin.With years of experience in product design, product testing, production and logistics we are confident that we can deliver a perfect water bottle to you based on the timeline defined in our campaign. We already have a first sample set of bottles from our production company which are being tested by selected users all over the world as we speak.Don’t let thirst come first. Get your EQUA today for an amazing early bird price and have the privilege to be among the first to experience the future of hydration.

story:
Who We Are

My name is Udy Onwudike and I am founder and CEO of The BioCrowd. Working in the field of human health actually runs in the family. My father is a Consultant Vascular Surgeon based in The North of England and my mother is a Ward Matron!

I took a less hands-on approach to working in the medical field and currently work full time for a Healthcare focused Market Intelligence and Strategy Consultancy in St Paul's. Myself and The BioCrowd team then spend the rest of our time getting the site up and running.


As much of my work involves advising private and early stage Biotechnology, Medical Device and Pharmaceutical companies on how best to source outside investment I deduced a number of issues striking these companies. Due to the fact that until a treatment has been deemed to be clinically safe it cannot be administered to patients, the key problem that these companies face is that they have limited sources of incoming revenue until they have a treatment approved and selling on the open market, something that we are aiming to change. 

 

Unfortunately getting a treatment to market costs hundreds of millions of pounds on average and for a company with no revenue, that is a lot of money! I have personally come across many companies with potentially ground breaking, market altering and life saving treatments that have unfortunately had to fold because they simply have not been able to source the funds needed to develop their treatments further. The world of healthcare investment is so competitive and investors are bombarded with offers and many great companies with fantastic business plans, great teams and a strong clinical product get lost in the crowd. 


So I why not shake things up and open up the world of healthcare investment to the masses? If we could do this then we could enable early stage healthcare companies to source the investment that they need from alternative sources and give themselves a fighting chance. Less folded companies leads to more approved treatments and more available remedies for friends, family members and patients around the world. So let me introduce you to The BioCrowd. A place where willing investors can invest in early stage healthcare companies in exchange for equity, promoting more healthcare innovation, benefiting human kind and hopefully turning a small profit in the process.


I am not alone in this venture and our team includes  

  • Jack Beadle (The Futures Trader) 
  •  Madu (The Consultant Vascular Surgeon) 
  • And our Non Exec-Director Andy (The CEO of property crowdfunding site Property Moose)

What We Need & What You Get

Like most other start-ups we need financial help to get us up and running and we thought what better way to fund a crowdfunding site, than to crowdfund it!

Building a site with The BioCrowd's features and capabilities is expensive. We have completed the first stage of development already. We have the search features up and running and we should have the Company and Investor Profiles finished by the end of the month. £14,000 GBP of your investment will go towards the completion of the website and £10,000 GBP will go towards finalising our FCA (Financial Conduct Authority) which will enable us to register companies and investors onto the site, launch and trade legally.




Due to the nature of our business we are afraid that we cannot offer you wonderful people any tangible perks. But, as we are a healthcare organisation we thought that we can give 15% percent of all the money that you have so kindly contributed to our Indiegogo Campaign to one of four healthcare charities, all of which are very close to our Hearts. There are many fantastic charities in existence doing brilliant work and all deserve recognition and funding. However on this occasion we would like you to help us to decide which one of these brilliant charities you would like donate to. Please see the Perks Section for more details!

    

                                                                                 

      

                                                                          

                                                              

                                                       

                                                                   



As a company we are dedicated to making a difference and we would love for you to join us and be a part of our story. We may not change the world (straight away) but we definitely believe that we can transform an industry. Wouldn't it be fantastic if the cure for Breast Cancer or HIV was crowdfunded via The BioCrowd? We want that to be our journey but to take a few key steps we need your help.

We would like to thank you for taking the time to view our campaign. We do understand that not everybody is in a position to contribute financially however we would be grateful if you could share and promote our campaign!

Thanks very much!

story:
Help Leonardo beat cancer!

Leonardo Konarsewski is a young Brazilian (age 21) who in 2013 was diagnosed with cancer (Hodgkin’s lymphoma). Unfortunately, after going through long and intense treatments in Brazil, he received the sad news that in his country there were no more medical means to fight his disease.

Beginning this year, he and his family were informed that his only chance of a cure was at the Mayo Clinic in Rochester, Minnesota (United States). The cost of the treatment exceeds US $450,000. His family does not have sufficient finances to pay these expenses. The only way to proceed with Leonardo’s treatment and save his life is through the support of friends, family and all who care.

More information can be found at:

www.gofundme.com/helpleonardokz

www.leokz.com/campaign/

www.facebook.com/ajudemeavencerocancer

story:
Introducing Holisticated:

The Holistic Beauty Oasis

 

Our Mission is Greater than just a book or beauty product.

Small start-up. HUGE mission.

At Holisticated, we believe in REAL, EMPOWERING, Holistic Beauty. Because being truly beautiful doesn’t have anything to do with where your eyes sit on your face, or how big your nose is. Beauty is a holistic concept, and to achieve true beauty, you must take a look at the big picture.

It's crucial that our inner-beauty comes to the forefront of our beauty discussions.

WHY?

Because the truth is, most people in today's world do not believe in themselves. They aren’t connecting with who they really are inside and reaching for their dreams. 

Globally, more than 300 million people suffer from depression. 

More than 264 million suffer from anxiety.

Not to mention the millions of others who deal with chronic stress, low self-esteem, and are living lives far below the quality they deserve.

The REAL problem, is most people do not believe these conditions can change. But thankfully, that's absolutely not true.

AMALIE'S STORY

I am one of the millions of millennials who had experienced the effects of chronic stress, anxiety, and depression for far too long. I didn't believe I'd ever find a sustainable solution to becoming a healthier new me. But thankfully, I did.

After graduating university, I dedicated the next three years of my life to making this change. And with the help of these practices, I finally got a hold over the depression and anxiety I had let ruin my life for years. I discovered that I not only had the power to heal myself but to help others heal through self-love and powerful self-care practices as well. 

"Once I discovered how to get a hold over the depression and anxiety I had let ruin my life for years, I found my passion and purpose in life: to share this knowledge with all of you, so that you don’t have to go through what I went through."

That's when HOLISTICATED was born. 

 

 

Holisticated: The Ultimate Guide to Holistic Beauty

Holisticated is a lighthearted, practical guide to holistic beauty + self-love, written with the modern millennial woman in mind. It includes tips, recipes, and practices that vary from Holistic Beauty to Natural Healing and Nutrition.

 

"It was so refreshing to learn more about wellness and spirituality from the holistic perspective. Without the need for stuffy new-age language, Amalie made it feel like anyone could pick up this book and feel at home practicing these self-care rituals." 

"I think what you are doing is amazing! Millennial women definitely need the kind of support, guidance, and inspiration that you provide."

"Finally, an easy going guide to caring for ourselves from head to toe, from morning to night and inside out. Written with an easy-going, yet joyfully inspiring tone. I absolutely loved it."  

"I particularly liked her emphasis on true authenticity and finding the practices and recipes that tailor to our lives."  

"What a treasure to have found you! I'm so on board with your mission/vision and I am glad to be taking part in the journey of true holistic beauty thanks to you!"

 

The Aura Makeover Kit: RENEW your Mind, Body, and Soul

 

 

Our Seven Essential Oil Formulations:

HOW TO FUND THIS CAMPAIGN

Head back up to the top to click the BACK IT button!

 

 

THANK YOU FROM THE BOTTOM OF MY HEART FOR YOUR SUPPORT!

 

FIND US ON FACEBOOK! https://www.facebook.com/weareholisticated/

FOLLOW US ON INSTAGRAM https://www.instagram.com/weareholisticated/

story:
Hi, my name is Coraline! I'm a trans lady from Canada, and I've been approved, by all the Dr's and Psychologists and etc, for sexual reassignment surgery (SRS).


THE WHAT

     I need an extra $3425 to be able to afford my SRS. I had planned to work until September so I could go for SRS in October. I've already got the surgery date booked (I like to book things far ahead) and everything arranged so I can pick up and go when time comes. Unfortunately, I fell sick in January, and have been on the road to recovery since, but I haven't been well enough to work at all. I have saved enough for most of it, but I'm short about $3500. (Yes I should be healthy enough for surgery come October)


THE BREAKDOWN

  • The Surgery Proper: $9,700
  • Skin Graft: $1,200 
  • Hotel: $3,000
  • Food: $225
  • Savings: $10,700
  • Total Remaining: $3425


THE WHY

     Before I really had things figured out, before I had words for what I need, I knew that I needed SRS. It's not so much a goal as it is setting things right with my body. I want to spend as much of my life with the body I am meant to have, so the first chance I got to make the appointment, I jumped at it. I have done everything in my power to make this a reality, and I need your help to get past this final hurdle. 


THE "WHAT YOU GET"

     I have arranged several perks, ranging from bizarre to silly to strange, for those of you who are so kind to help me out a bit. I need every penny I can scrape up so most of them will be things I can make for you by hand. If you can't afford to help out monetarily (I know what that's like!), signal boosting, reblogging, sharing on facebook, or screaming out info at passing planes, would mean so much to me! I would really appreciate any help you can provide.

story:
I work as a basketball coach and substitute teacher at Mission High School. One of the students I work with has some serious dental health issues. He is 15 years old and is in need of roughly $15,000 of dental surgery. 

The identity of the student is being kept anonymous, but those of you who know him can attest to the strength of his character and energy. This is an intelligent and driven young man, that has surmounted challenges in his life and persists with positivity and love for his community.

We've found a wonderful dentist (Dr. Polan of Alameda Landing Dentistry) willing to donate her time and resources for the exam, cleaning and fillings. The initial examination revealed that the student was in a pretty dire situation and was in need of nine fillings, and six root canals. Dr. Polan confided in us that without interference he would be at serious risk of blood infection and heart disease and would likely be in need of dentures by the age of 30! 

Dr. Polan has also helped us to find an endodontist (Dr. Foulk of Sierra Smiles in Auburn) willing to graciously donate 50% of the costs for the needed root canals. With the generosity of Dr. Polan and Dr. Foulk, we have been able to reduce the total cost of these procedures to only $5000, and we are turning to your generosity to ask for help raising this money. Every dollar is needed, and whatever you can give will help this young man begin his adult life healthy and with confidence.

Thank you for your time and support!

Ben

story:
USTSA needs help funding the 2015 Telemark World Championships in Steamboat Springs, Colorado.

The United States Telemark Ski Association ("USTSA") is a non profit athletic organization that promotes the sport of Telemark skiing in the U.S. by hosting competitive and educational events. Also, USTSA is the governing body of the U.S. Telemark Ski Team. USTSA has the opportunity to bring the FIS Telemark World Championships to U.S. soil! Please help us fund this rare and prestigious event by donating on this website. 

If you are new to Telemark racing, please read-on.

Telemark ski racing is the oldest, hardest, and most exciting form of ski racing! Telemark ski racing is the only world cup discipline that tests all forms of competitive skiing in one top-to-bottom event. 

Telemark ski racing combines features of all three major competitive ski disciplines (Alpine, Nordic, and Jumping) to form a grueling and unique ski race. Competitors complete nordic style (lunging) turns through gates; fly off a Nordic jump, complete a reipelykkje (Norwegian for "knot of rope," American for large 360 banked turn aka "the toilet bowl" or "Rap"); and then skate ski to the finish. Time penalties are assessed by gate and jump judges if racers fail to achieve "boot space" while turning (i.e., complete a fully lunging turn); fail to land past the jump line (distance); and fail to land the jump in a nordic stance (just like ski jumping).  

World Cup Telemark events include the Classic, Sprint Classic, and Parallel Sprint. 

Classic

Classics kill! The Classic is the longest and most grueling of the Telemark events. The Classic consists of one run with courses running between 230 to 500 vertical metres. Courses include a jump, Rap, and long skate. Picture lunging through 70 panels at 80 km/h (50 mi/h), flying 30 metres through the air, and then having to skate ski for 3 minutes, sometimes up hill, to finish the race! Welcome to the Classic - Classics Kill!

Sprint Classic

The Sprint Classic is similar to the classic, and is the most popular of the Telemark events. Typically, the Sprint Classic is shorter in length than the Classic, and consists of two-runs with times and penalties are totalled together to determine the winner. 

Parallel Sprint

Head to head combat! Of all of the telemark racing events, the parallel sprint is the most exciting to watch. Two Sprint length courses are set back to back, and racers compete side by side in a tournament style elimination bracket. Racers fly-off the same jump and are funneled in the same "Rap" before having to skate-it-out on the flats. Penalties are totalled live on the hill, and racers are required to skate further if they have gate or jump penalties. Bring on course carnage and hurt feelings! 

Please donate to help bring the best Telemark skiers in the world to Steamboat Spring for the 2015 FIS World Championships! 

View the results from the 2014 Telemark World Cup in Steamboat Springs, CO
story_txt: USTSA needs help funding the 2015 Telemark World Championships in Steamboat Springs, Colorado.The United States Telemark Ski Association ("USTSA") is a non profit athletic organization that promotes the sport of Telemark skiing in the U.S. by hosting competitive and educational events. Also, USTSA is the governing body of the U.S. Telemark Ski Team. USTSA has the opportunity to bring the FIS Telemark World Championships to U.S. soil! Please help us fund this rare and prestigious event by donating on this website. If you are new to Telemark racing, please read-on.Telemark ski racing is the oldest, hardest, and most exciting form of ski racing! Telemark ski racing is the only world cup discipline that tests all forms of competitive skiing in one top-to-bottom event. Telemark ski racing combines features of all three major competitive ski disciplines (Alpine, Nordic, and Jumping) to form a grueling and unique ski race. Competitors complete nordic style (lunging) turns through gates; fly off a Nordic jump, complete a reipelykkje (Norwegian for "knot of rope," American for large 360 banked turn aka "the toilet bowl" or "Rap"); and then skate ski to the finish. Time penalties are assessed by gate and jump judges if racers fail to achieve "boot space" while turning (i.e., complete a fully lunging turn); fail to land past the jump line (distance); and fail to land the jump in a nordic stance (just like ski jumping).  World Cup Telemark events include the Classic, Sprint Classic, and Parallel Sprint. ClassicClassics kill! The Classic is the longest and most grueling of the Telemark events. The Classic consists of one run with courses running between 230 to 500 vertical metres. Courses include a jump, Rap, and long skate. Picture lunging through 70 panels at 80 km/h (50 mi/h), flying 30 metres through the air, and then having to skate ski for 3 minutes, sometimes up hill, to finish the race! Welcome to the Classic - Classics Kill!Sprint ClassicThe Sprint Classic is similar to the classic, and is the most popular of the Telemark events. Typically, the Sprint Classic is shorter in length than the Classic, and consists of two-runs with times and penalties are totalled together to determine the winner. Parallel SprintHead to head combat! Of all of the telemark racing events, the parallel sprint is the most exciting to watch. Two Sprint length courses are set back to back, and racers compete side by side in a tournament style elimination bracket. Racers fly-off the same jump and are funneled in the same "Rap" before having to skate-it-out on the flats. Penalties are totalled live on the hill, and racers are required to skate further if they have gate or jump penalties. Bring on course carnage and hurt feelings! Please donate to help bring the best Telemark skiers in the world to Steamboat Spring for the 2015 FIS World Championships! View the results from the 2014 Telemark World Cup in Steamboat Springs, CO

story:
Type: Advanced Beauty + Wellness

HQ: San Francisco, CA

Products: The Fizz Tab, pH Balance Hydrosol, Oil H2O, Day & Night Face Oil

Known for: Oil H2O

Mission: Sutro Lab uses a scientific approach to innovate wellness and beauty products to maximize their positive impact on our customers' health and wellness. Our products are derived from natural constituents specifically chosen for the therapeutic properties of their unique molecular compositions.

Principles: No one is going to protect you and your health except you. The more information you have, the better able you will be to make good choices, thus controlling your exposure to synthetics, carcinogens, preservatives, and toxins of all kinds. This level of awareness is the minimum necessary if your intention is to preserve and maintain health.

The company principles therefore are intended to contribute towards providing the highest quality natural products and clarifying the scientific research their therapeutic properties are based on.

I will use $20,000 and my extensive knowledge of Retail Sales & Brand Management to open a retail cart at The Westfield Mall in San Francisco to create an outlet for my brand. We are already in talks with representatives of the mall and have been quoted $5000 per month for a 3 month lease= $15000. The remaining $5000 will go towards payroll and expenses. 

What we'll be doing while using your funds:

So in the meantime, we have already secured $67,000 in capital to develop and produce our line. All the products that you see have already been produced. That means when you contribute, we are able to ship your item out in just a few days. So in addition to having ready to go merchandise, we have the means to market and expand what your contribution is helping us to build.

We currently run an e-commerce site: www.SutroLab.com and have a show room and retail space in the heart of Japan Town in San Francisco where our products are produced. 

Sutro Lab 1731-1B Buchanan St. San Francisco Ca 94115

Featured Product:

Oil H2O System: "Change Your Mood in 30 Seconds"

Our solutions are comprised of organic steam distilled and cold pressed essential oils fused with pure H2O using an FDA proprietary ingredient. Each variation contains constituents that trigger areas in the brain that relate to the emotions causing neurological stimulation. Depending on the composition of each solution, it has diverse effects on the physical and emotional body. To be used with our Ultrasonic Atomizer for Neurostimulation. 

Using ultrasonic sound waves, the atomizer breaks up its contents into particles small enough to be absorbed by the respiratory system and tiny nerves, located in the roof of the inner nose. These chemical messengers have direct access to the part of the brain that secretes hormones into the bloodstream to regulate mood, metabolism, growth and development. 

For skin care application, The sound waves break up solutions into small enough particles to be absorbed by the skin and then propels the solution into the skin allowing for maximum absorption while the cool fog generated during the atomization process seals poraes and locks in moisture. 

The Atomizer propels a continuous cool fog for 30 seconds before automatically switching off.

Variations:

[Basil] - Linalool: Balancing to the autonomic nervous systemeffects on stress states are rapid and efficient, bringing a sense of calm, reducing physical tension in the body 

[Chamomile] - Linalyl acetate(+other esters): Calming to the central nervous system, relieves symptoms related to shock 

[Eucalyptus] - Eucalyptol: The first line of defense against respiratory problems and infections, coughs, colds, chest infections, and hay fever– type allergies 

 [Lavender] - Linalyl acetate: - Antipanic/antianxiety agent, relieve pain from tension headache [Peppermint] - Menthol + Menthone: Stimulating, strengthening, works for motion sickness or general nausea 

[Pink Grapefruit] - α-Pinene + Limonene + Linalool: Immune stimulating, antiviral, balance autonomic nervous system, uplifting 

[Rose Geranium] - Citronellol (+other terpene alcohols): Uplifting effects, stabilizes the nervous system 

[Tangerine] - Citral + Limonene: Antistress and calming agent, and it is mildly sedative to the central nervous system without causing sleepiness 

[Tea Tree] - Terpinen-4-ol (+other terpene alcohols): Very powerful immune stimulant, fights all 3 categories of infectious organisms:bacterias, viruses, fungi 

[Ylang Ylang] - Citronellyl acetate (+other sesquiterpenes & esters): Antidepressant, aphrodisiac, hypotensive, nervine and sedative substance 

Composition:

[Distilled H20]- Steam distilled H20 prevents change to the composition of the benneficial properties in our solution. Effectivness of constituents are compromised by impurities found in tap water such as metals, minerals and bacteria.

 [Essential Oil]- Each EO contains constituents that that trigger areas in the brain that relate to the emotions causing neurological stimulation 

[FDA Registered Proprietary Ingredient]- Fuses H20 with Essential Oil to make molecules that can be evenly dispursed in its application 

System: 60ml of Oil H2O Solution (in 3x 20ml Re-Usable Glass Vials)

 Empty Mixing Vial 

1x Ultrasonic Atomizer 

1x USB Power Source 

4x Vial Top Dropper 

1x Separating pipettes

Other Products:

  • [Evening Primrose Oil]-Linoleic acid: Rich in unsaturated omega-6 fatty acid, anti-inflammatory and moisture retentive properties when applied topically on the skin
  • [Virgin Wild-Harvested Argan Oil]-α-tocopherol: High concentration of Vitamin E act as a peroxyl radical scavenger, preventing the propagation of free radicals in tissues
  • [JoJoba Liquid Wax]-Gadoleic Acid: acts as a humectant which will attract moisture to your skin
  • [Shea Olein]-Oleic acid: derived from shea butter, this liquid form is a complex mixture of compounds specially designed to make the external layers of the epidermis softer and more pliable
  • [Babassu Oil(Butter)]-Lauric acid: Has soothing, protective, anti-microbial and emollient properties. The body readily accepts and absorbs this skin calming extract
  • [Meadowfoam Seed Extract]-Erucic Acid: Acts as a emollient providing a protective layer to the skin. Also holds ultra-violet protection to block rays that will act as irritants

[Day] & [Night] Face Oil :"Just When You Thought Argan Was The Best You Could Get"

 [Component N°1] Morning face serum + [Rose Absolute] Therapy

Extract composition: not chemically altered, bleached, or otherwise chemically treated to remove scent and color.

  • [Virgin Blueberry Seed Extract]- alpha-Linolenic acid: works to maintain a healthy rate of skin cell renewal while simultaneously reducing inflammation. A potent antioxidant containing high amounts of naturally occuring tocopherols and Omega 3 fatty acids.
  • [Virgin Red Raspberry Seed Extract]- alpha-Linolenic acid: works to maintain a healthy rate of skin cell renewal while simultaneously reducing inflammation. Rich in vitamin A, essential fatty acitds and Contains high levels of UV-A and UV-B blocking properties. Highly Antioxidant. 
  • [Virgin Cranberry Seed Extract]-gamma-tocotrienol: is a form of natural vitamin E that is good for a variety of skin related issues from acne outbreaks to eczema. Penetrated the skin to treat underlaying issues. Highly Antioxidant.
  • [Unrefined Sea Buckthorn Berry Extract]-Linoleic acid: anti-inflammatory, acne reductive, and moisture retentive properties when applied topically on the skin. Cold pressed from the whole berry, it has not been refined to maintain the integrety of this precious oil and its skin nourishing properties. 
  • [Virgin Pomegranite Seed Extract]-Linoleic acid: anti-inflammatory, acne reductive, and moisture retentive properties when applied topically on the skin

[Component N°2] Evening face serum + [Chamomile EO] Therapy

Extract Composition: not chemically altered, bleached, or otherwise chemically treated to remove scent and color.

  • [Squalane]- Formulated to be a Holographic Substance that mimics your bodies own secretion. The human body produces its own form of squalane and in time it produces less and less. This natuaral olive derived version is a complex extraction that makes itself available for the body to readily accept. Full absorption allows no oily resedue or greasy feeling. Amazing lipid replenishing properties for youth rejuvenation. 
  • [Organic Jojoba Liquid Wax]- Gadoleic Acid: acts as a humectant which will attract moisture to your skin. Cold pressed, it has not been refined to maintain the integrety of this precious oil and its skin nourishing properties. 
  • [Evening Primrose Oil]- Linoleic acid: rich in unsaturated omega-6 fatty acid, anti-inflammatory and moisture retentive properties when applied topically on the skin. 
  • [Virgin Organic Rose Hip Oil]-Linoleic acid - antiinflammatory, acne reductive, and moisture retentive properties when applied topically on the skin. High in vitamin C, it has not been refined to maintain the integrety of this precious oil and its skin nourishing properties. 

Mini Ultrasonic Humidifier (developed for our Hydrosol Technology line coming soon!)

Color: White with logo

Features: Humidifying the air by utilizing ultrasonic cool misting Idea for home, office or travel 0.5L capacity, runs for up to 6-8 hours without refill As an aroma diffuser with few drops of water-solvable essential oil added in Size: 130*61*90mm Weight: 236g Voltage: AC 100C-240V 50/60Hz Package include: 1x Ultrasonic Air Humidifier 1x Power Adapter

In Development:

The Fizz Tab "Bath Salts Are So Twentieth Century"

For the ultimate bathing experience, we use over 5,000 pounds of pressure to compress Dead Sea Salt, Milk and Epsom  blended with a Sodium Bicarbonate Mixture to make "The Fizz Tab". An effervescent bath tablet formulated to force open pores to make skin ideal for bathing products to be effective. While in the water osmosis works to draw the ingredients of the tablet into pores moisturizing  detoxifying and healing damaged skin while bubbles and foam work with the fizzing action of the tablet to buff away dead skin cells and remove impurities from pores. Nine constituents available.


[Lemon Grass]

[Pink Grapefruit]

[Lemon]

[Peppermint]

[Sweet Orange]




Packaging:1000ml re-usable custom Borosilicate Glass Erlenmeyer Flask



 

 

Sean Sprawling

Founder

Experience Overcomes Challenge: 

As with any project there can be set backs. Anything from weather to customs holds can effect the job. The key is knowing how to manage and adjust to the situation. With years of experience as a General Manager, Consultant, Sales & Brand Manager on several large projects it was only natural for me to create my own brand.

My last project was a complete re-brand for The San Francisco Bath Salt Co. on Pier 39 in San Francisco California. The largest importer of Dead Sea Salt and Manufacturer of Bath Salts in the country. I conceptualized and re-designed their entire flagship store currently still in operation. As part of my re-brand strategy I custom designed and implemented a sales process as well as developed products that would appeal to their base while crossing over into a higher end market. Before managing the re-brand of the store, I was the General Manager. Over all I worked a total of 4 years as a Consultant and Manager for this company in which time we hit all time record sales each year of my management. My last title before departing was Retail Marketing & Brand Manager.

Pier 39 Project Before:

Pier 39 Project After:


My first large project was Le Marche, an Antiquities and Architectural Elements Gallery featuring 20 of the finest Designers & Dealers in Houston TX (KMK Interiors, Shabby Slips, Chandos Interiors, FrameTek...). This was a challenge considering the previous business in this space was an auto shop that had caught fire. We had to completely gut the building. I served as the project manager, worked with contractors and oversaw construction. I even built walls and wired the entire building with new electrical as an electricians apprentice. After construction I went on the be the General Manager. I created their Brand, implemented a custom sales process, set up a security system and procedures, created day to day store procedures, set up an inventory database and served as the point of contact for both Vendors & Clients before moving to San Francisco.

I started my first job on the sales floor and in only 2 weeks I was the top sales person and continued to be every month in the three years of my employment. I've been starting my own businesses since i was 6 selling candy, Pokemon cards, Slammers & Pogs! Whatever was popular at the time you could bet I started a business.

I know what hard work is. When times got rough as a kid I didn't hesitate to go outside and sell my candy and toys to the other kids so that I could buy more, sell those and give the money to my mother at 10yrs old. It seemed natural to adapt to the situation and create a business.  I saved up money and invested in a candy store i ran from the kitchen counter top of our apartment. It wasn't long before the apartment building staff were reporting low sales of their vending machine items and the woman we used to call "the candy lady" would stop replenishing her stock of blow pops and soda now that her customers were mine. 

I've managed several specialty retail stores and i must say that every one had their own challenges . I am very grateful for the hard times. In business, hard times taught me how to adapt and how to think quickly on my feet. With each job i've been able to take such value and polish it into a toolbox of ideas, knowledge, experience and ability to finally branch off on my own and build a business.

story:
Hello. My name is Philip Malone, and my wife Jan and I are parents of a special needs girl named Shaelyn Lee (now 14 years). Shaelyn was born with a chromosomal deletion (14Q 32.3), resulting in mental  retardation.  She was also born with an extemely high and narrow pallet, not allowing her tongue to touch the roof of her mouth. This inhibits her ability to pronounce words and has been using a Dynavox V speaking device the last 10 years. Shaelyn must also sleep with a C-Pap machine because her mouth is so small it closes off her airway.

The surgery Shaelyn will have will widen her pallet, align her lower jaw and straighten her teeth. With in a year our hope is Shaelyn will be able to talk without the use of a machine and sleep safely at night without the C-Pap machine.

Unfortunately, my insurance will cover only a small portion of the medical expenses...leaving us with a significant medical bill. Your contributions will help Shaelyn to have a better quality of life as well as be more independent.

 

Thank you for your consideration:

Philip and Jan

Unfortunately, my insurance will cover only a small portion of the medical expenses...leaving us with a significant medical bill. Your contributions will help Shaelyn to have a better quality of life as well as be more independent.
 
Thank you for your consideration:
Philip and Jan

story:
Brian Maxwell Jarvis, a dedicated and beloved father, son, brother,  friend and co-worker was taken from us suddenly on Feb 1, 2015. 

In lieu of flowers, those who so desire may make memorial donations to an education trust fund that has been set up for the 2 Jarvis children.

Thank-you for contributing

Should you prefer to make your donation to the trust in person, you can walk into any CIBC branch in the GTA and contribute to the trust account: Transit#: 08152 Account#:66-03882

story:
It is a stylish Bluetooth stereo headset that
enhances your hearing whenever you need it.

 

BeHear NOW shares many of the same components as the leading hearing aids, but in contrast provides:

  • 4x stronger Digital Signal Processor running more advanced algorithms
  • 4x microphones for ultimate noise reduction

 

 

BeHear NOW supports a much wider hearing spectrum than hearing aids, well beyond human speech to include the realm of live music.

     

     

     

     

    BeHear NOW is the first in a line of Wear & Hear concept products developed by Alango Technologies, Ltd. The product is ready and the first 300 units are waiting for the backers of this campaign.

    We at Alango have been developing and implementing digital sound enhancement technologies in consumer goods for over 15 years. And, with tens of millions of users benefiting from Alango software integrated in various products, we know how to do it right! Our advanced algorithms reduce loud noises, remove annoying echo, and enhance speech to make it sound loud and clear.

    About three years ago we decided to leverage this knowledge and pair it with existing consumer electronic devices to help you, and the people you care about, hear better for improved quality of life all around.

    Features 

    • Built-in hearing test
    • Controls for hearing
      • Location preset selection
      • Volume
      • Real-time Best Sound Point (BSP) customization
      • Noise reduction setting
    • Controls for music play, phone call handling
    • Headset behavior settings
      • left/right ear balance
      • hearing mode defaults
      • vibration
      • auto-connect

    Operating Systems

    • Android (version 4.4 and higher)
    • iOS (version 9 and higher)

    Sample Screens

      If members of the household (or its neighbors) can’t agree on the television volume, we recommend the BeHear NOW + HearLink transmitter bundle:

      HearLink is a Bluetooth® transmitter that connects to the analog sound output found on most standard television sets and other audio devices. It sends the audio signal directly to the paired BeHear NOW headset, thus eliminating ambient noises, room reverberation, and other types of sound interference which hamper intelligibility of speech and music appreciation.

      The BeHear NOW headset can be connected to the HearLink TV transmitter and to a smartphone at the same time. It allows you to watch TV with the ListenThrough technology activated (passing through important ambient sounds via the headset), and also get/make phone calls.

      Main Features

      • Supports low latency audio streaming
      • Supports AVRCP commands (play/pause) for seamless operation with BeHear
      • AutoON (automatic ‘power on’ if charged from the television set USB port)
      • Battery operation for convenient use with portable players, mobile phones or computers
      • Lightweight and compact

        Bluetooth

        • Version 4.2, Class II
        • HFP 1.6, HSP 1.2, A2DP
        • Range: 10m

          Acoustic Performance

          • Maximal Sound Pressure Level (OSPL90), HFA: 116 dB SPL
          • Full-on Gain, HFA: 42 dB
          • Total Harmonic Distortion (THD):  < 0.7%
          • Receiver Specifications
            • Speaker: 13.6 mm receivers
            • Frequency Response: 20 Hz to 20 kHz
          • Microphone Specifications
            • Microphones (four in total):
              • Ultra low-noise 74 dB SNR ECM (Electret Condenser Microphone) in each earpiece
              • Low-noise digital 64 dB SNR MEMS in each control box
            • Frequency Response: 100 Hz to 15 kHz

            Battery

            • Rechargeable single cell Lithium Ion
            • Charging interface: Micro-USB
            • Capacity: 250mAH

            Operation Time

            • Hearing mode: 15+ hours
            • Talk: 10+ hours
            • Play: 8+ hours
            • Standby: 600 hours

            Wearing Style

            • Neck loop (behind the neck)

            Headset Weight

            • 29 g (1.0 oz.)

              Agency Approvals

              • CE RED
              • FCC

              Our team comes from diverse professional backgrounds and cultural heritages. We work in two different offices: our company headquarters in Haifa, Israel, and a development center in St. Petersburg, Russia. While the employees listed below participate directly in the BeHear NOW project, there are more than 20 others whose collective work contributes to the product's overall development.

              Israel-based team - left to right: Suhail Habib Alla - Audiologist and Sound Engineer; Ran Ben Ezer - Lead Embedded Software Engineer; Alex Radzishevsky - Chief Audio Engineer and Director of Product Development; Ruth Bridger - Marketing Director of Assistive Products; Alexander Goldin - CEO & Founder; Nirel ben Shabat - Embedded Software Engineer; Tatiana Borovikova - Assistive Products Coordinator; Nimrod Shiman - Audio Application Engineer; Michael Bukchin - Director of R&D; Ishay Berkovich - Field Application Engineer; Ber Bistritsky - Hardware Engineer

              Russia-based team - left to right: Dmitry Fedotov - DSP Software Engineer; Nikolay Ermolenko - Senior DSP Software Engineer; Sergei Kib - Technical Director of Alango Russia; Andrew Mikhailov - DSP Algorithms and Software Engineer

              BeHear NOW, the first member of our Wear & Hear line of assistive listening products, has been designed, developed, and its first 300 units have been manufactured. We would like your help to broaden our reach and collect information from a wide variety of hearing situations, to provide feedback about:

               

              And if, based on your feedback, we make changes to our software, you will immediately be able to apply the update to your BeHear Now headset wirelessly and effortlessly, via the smartphone application.

              1. “Early Adopter”: Reduced price for BeHear NOW = $129 (instead of $249) + shipping (between $5 and $15, depending on your shipping location)

              2. “TV Listening Bundle”: Reduced price for BeHear NOW w/HearLink TV transmitter = $159 + shipping (between $5 and $25, depending on your shipping location)

              • Help us spread the word that there is a solution which can bring enhanced hearing to those people for whom a hearing aid has not provided the answer.
              • Bring joy (the gift of hearing) to your loved ones and colleagues who are in denial, or who are avoiding hearing aids because of cost, accessibility, stigma or functionality issues.
              • Increase connection with your congregation, employees, patrons by providing them with a simple tool for hearing enhancement – when they need it.

              BeHear NOW is our first assistive listening product. Our tests to date are extremely promising, but we are not yet satisfied that we have everything we need to know. We believe that broadening our testing scope on this crowdfunding platform will provide us with important feedback that will guide the direction of our development in versions and products to come.

              We are confident that BeHear NOW will satisfy the basic need for affordable, accessible quality hearing. Back our campaign to purchase units for yourself or someone you know and then provide your feedback. 

              However, if you can't back us, that doesn't mean you can't help!:

              • Get the word out in your own circles
              • Make some noise about this campaign on social media
              • Use the Indiegogo share tools

              How can I get in touch with you?

              Visit our Facebook page, or leave a message on our Web site: http://wearandhear.com/contact/

              When will the first BeHear NOW headsets be delivered?

              We plan to start shipping the first units as soon as the Indiegogo campaign closes in mid-February, 2018.

              What comes in the BeHear NOW box?

              The box includes a headset, a USB charging cable, a travel pouch, two types of silicon ear tips in different sizes, multiple pairs of ear hooks in varying sizes, 2 pairs of wind protection covers, and a printed Quick Start Guide.

              What comes in the HearLink box?

              The box includes the transmitter, a Micro-USB cable for charging directly from the television (where supported) or from an electrical wall socket, two audio cables (3.5mm and 2xRCA for convenient connection to various appliances), and technical documentation.

              Who can benefit from BeHear NOW?

              We developed BeHear NOW to help people hear better in various situations, taking into account individual preferences and the uniqueness of each person’s auditory system. Hearing loss is an example of “uniqueness” that can be addressed by BeHear NOW, and compensated to some extent depending on the listening/hearing conditions. While BeHear NOW was designed to help people with mild-to-moderate hearing loss, initial tests show that even those with severe hearing loss experience hearing improvement. You will need to decide for yourself if BeHear NOW can improve your hearing experience in certain situations.

              Is BeHear NOW a hearing aid?

              While BeHear NOW uses the same digital signal processing algorithms as most advanced hearing aids, BeHear NOW is not a hearing aid (nor is it a medical device).

              Can BeHear NOW restore hearing?

              While the advanced algorithms used in BeHear NOW can improve the hearing/listening experience, they cannot restore hearing completely.

              How much hearing amplification gain does BeHear NOW provide?

              The maximal gain provided by BeHear NOW is approximately 45dB.

              How do I know the BeHear NOW earbuds will fit me?

              BeHear NOW is supplied with numerous sets of silicon ear tips and ear hooks in different sizes and styles. We trust that you will be able to find the right combination for your ears.

              How do I charge the BeHear NOW headset?

              BeHear NOW is supplied with a micro USB charging cable. Use it to charge the headset from your computer, or together with a standard AC outlet adapter (purchased separately) to charge the headset from a wall socket.

              How long will the BeHear NOW battery last?

              • in “hearing mode”: 15+ hours
              • for phone use: 10+ hours
              • for music play: 8+ hours
              • in standby mode: ~600 hours

              A full charge takes about 2 hours.

              What happens if I receive a phone call when I’m listening to music?

              You can choose whether to accept or reject the call, either by pressing buttons on the control box (located on the headset cable) or using your mobile phone.

              I wear glasses. Can I wear the headset at the same time?

              Absolutely! The earbuds are “in ear”, with nothing resting on the back of your ear (where your glasses sit).

              I don’t want to have the buds in my ears all the time. How can I prevent the headset from slipping off my neck?

              The earbuds include magnets and will stick together (even through the wind protectors) in front of your chest.

              How do I get the smartphone application for the headset?

              Download the “W&H BeHear” application from Google Play or the Apple Store. It will be available just before the products begin shipping.

              Which operating system does the BeHear NOW smartphone application support?

              The BeHear NOW smartphone application supports both Android (from version 4.4 and up) and iOS (from version 9 and up).

              Can I use the headset without a smartphone?

              Absolutely! You can benefit from the ambient hearing without a smartphone. The smartphone is necessary if you want to run the BeHear NOW control application, but the headset itself includes 7 built-in control buttons that allow you to use it autonomously. You can pair BeHear NOW and use it with any Bluetooth device such as a feature phone, music player, laptop, etc. and use it for hearing enhancement, phone calls or listening to music or other recorded audio.

              Can I use the headset without Bluetooth?

              Yes. You do not need Bluetooth to benefit from the ambient hearing functionality. However, without Bluetooth you will not be able to stream audio from your mobile phone or music player directly to the BeHear NOW headset.

              Is the headset waterproof?

              No. This would have added extra cost. We are creating a different model for our “Wear & Hear” family called BeHear Active which will suit people with active lifestyles.

              Is there a product warranty?

              Yes, we offer a limited 1-year product warranty against manufacturing defects.

              One of the 300 hundred units in these boxes could have your name on it! Act fast to claim it in the Perks list...

story:
THERE'S A LOT OF WEIGHTED BLANKETS OUT THERE - WHY SECŪR?

Fair question. To make the perfect weighted blanket, we had to find out find out what people felt like they were missing from the other guys. 

The issues became clear: 

Bad stitching overfilled with cheap beads came apart

Bigger quilts created shifting beads and inconsistent weight distribution

Some minky fabrics got too hot in the Summer while others were too scratchy and cheap 

Perhaps most importantly - blankets without covers got dirty and proved difficult to wash

We aimed to tackle all of these issues by creating a high thread-count, 100% cotton blanket using glass beads to fill smaller quilted diamonds. The result is a blanket that is soft, durable, and always keeps weight distributed evenly. 

 

To keep your blanket clean and your washing machine safe, we developed a cover with eight ties and a discreet zipper to hold the blanket in place and prevent shifting. The cover ismachine washable and made from the same high-quality cotton as the blankets. 

Unlike other brands out there, our cover is included with every blanket.

We also noticed that the other covers out there are a little bit…boring. To make the Secūr cover, we commissioned an Italian artist to create a pattern with tones of purple and blue that are scientifically proven to have a calming effect when observed. 

 

Hand Home was developed to give your hands a place to fidget by kneading, squeezing and pinching together thousands of small beads sewn behind a layer of soft, minky fabric. 

You can use Hand Home as a tool to step away from your screen – whether it's your phone, computer or the TV – and take a moment to relax, reset and enjoy the sensation of returning to a more mindful state.

The Hand Home is great for being  used in the house after a long day or while you're traveling and on the go.

 

The Traveler was developed with another industry secret in mind – even a small amount of weight concentrated in a single area (such as on your lap or chest) can have the same calming effect as a full size blanket.

The Traveler weighs just five pounds and is ideal for children and students, and especially perfect for adults seeking relief during their breaks at work or when traveling on planes, buses or train rides.

 

 

 

 

Endorsed by Rory <3^^

 

ABOUT THE CREATOR

Paula Buchanan is a licensed speech language pathologist with over 33 years working with children and adults of all abilities.  

She has been a consultant to day cares and preschools and has been teaching college for the past 5 years.  

Paula has been concerned about the stress, anxiety and other challenges that affect the quality of life of her clients, students and family.  She has seen the benefits of weighted therapy to  increased calm, attention and comfort leading to improved quality of life.  

PRESS KIT

 

CREDITS

VIDEO:  Jamel Mosely | Mel eMedia Creative Director/ Video Producer  http://melemedia.com/ 

PICTURES: Kelsey Beattie  https://kelseybeattie.com/ 

Risks and Challenges

Our team of product designers, engineers, and manufacturing experts have produced some products that you might already have around the house. We were excited to meet an expert who knows what it takes to make the best weighted blankets on the market.

We understand the risks of launching new products and because of that we only develop the ones we think will really resonate with you.

story:
Our Story

My name is Dorshan Millhouse.  I am the founder of Pawsitive Therapeutic Consulting Services an Animal-Assisted Therapy (AAT) & Animal-Assisted Activity (AAA) Organization.


What is Animal-Assisted Therapy? How does it work?  In our case we specialize in Great Dane Therapy Dogs.  Professionals schedule a PTCS Therapy Dane to play an intricate roll in treatment sessions.  Patients or clients may be physically, socially, emotionally or cognitively challenged, and have specific goals/progress reports that will be updated throughout each session. Visitation is scheduled and worked around the individual’s needs.


In addition to Therapy work, PTCS volunteers time for Animal-Assisted Activity sessions. These visits can be spontaneous or scheduled.  Therapy Danes engage groups or individuals in a variety of social settings. Visitation times are considered flexible.  In Animal-Assisted Activities, no treatment is being performed or progress of a patient is being documented.  Animal-Assisted Activities are fun and relaxed sessions where the Therapy Dane may entertain or just enjoy companionship.

The Impact

By donating today, you will be sponsoring the costs for our growing Dane in training.  Her training will allow her to participate in four programs we will be offering to the community.  These programs are FREE!! 


Pawsitive Assistance Canine Therapy (PACT) Program:  Therapy Danes enter into a “pact” to remain loyal and supportive when asked to assist in matters of the legal system, as well as Child Protective Services, in providing emotional support and relaxation to a minor or disabled individual during court mandated situations.

         It's difficult to imagine the stress that children face when needing to testify in court.  Our Dane will be there before, after and if requested - on the stand during court sessions to lower the stress and anxiety levels during such a difficult process.  

         In addition, children in the foster care system have visitation with their biological families during times of separation.  Sometimes parents do not make it for the visits and it can be devastating for the children.  In other cases, children are filled with emotions and anxiety having to face their parents after being separated.  Our Dane can be there before and after visits to be that emotional cushion.


Tail Time Program: Therapy Danes will be reading companions to improve literacy skills within local academic institutions and libraries.

        As a parent of a high risk reader this program is a great motivational tool.  Our Dane can visit your school, or local library and become your child's reading buddy.  They literally read to the Dane.  Studies that have been done show that children have increased their reading level by two grades! 


Sergeant Paw Program: AAT and AAA for Veterans, Active Duty, and Retired Military men and women.  A Therapy Dane can make appearances at Deployment Departures, Tour of Duty Homecomings, and other military programs as requested.

       As a military family we can relate to the stress of multiple deployments.  Not every Soldier has a family to come home to.  That is why we felt it was important that our Dane attend Deployment Departures and Homecomings.  Allowing everyone that downtime needed before they get on the plane and as they adjust to the reality they are home.


Paw Adventures Program:   Therapy Dogs assist in physical, occupational, and speech therapy sessions assisting professionals to continue progressing with a patient’s goals to recovery and/or continued wellness.  Paw Adventures also provides support in airports, hospice, nursing homes, retirement communities, shelters, libraries, community events (ie: Special Olympics) and other outreach programs.

         Speech/Occupational/Physical Therapy are some examples of our Paw Adventures effort.  Speech Therapy has played a roll in our family life.  I have had the opportunity to talk to several families and therapists who have said how valuable animals are in therapy and how wonderful it would be to have one on site.  PTCS wants to make that possible.  Dogs are wonderful motivational tools.  If a child is hesitant to walk, they are more likely to want to walk to get closer to a dog.  If a child does not talk, they are more willing to be talkative about what they are seeing or touching.  If a child's muscle development and coordination aren't strong enough to brush their own hair, they can strengthen their muscles by brushing their Therapy Dog.   

       

These are programs that improve the quality of life and you can feel comfortable knowing you are making a difference in a person's life by helping us meet our goal today.


Breakdown of Costs

Food Costs:  $720 for the year

Training Costs (harnesses, clothes/costumes (for children visits), courses, gas etc...):  $1000 year

Marketing Costs (t-shirts, brochures, business cards, etc...):  $500 year

Vet Costs (including spay, vaccinations, monthly treatments for flea, tick, heartworm):  $780 year


Other Ways You Can Help


To meet our goal we need $43 a day donated in 69 days.  

If you are unable to donate at this time please spread the word!  You can help make our goal possible!  Whether you donate or spread the word we appreciate your support and generosity in helping our organization expand and bring recognition to our programs.

We are also always looking for places that are open for training purposes.  If your place of employment is interested in having a 10-20 minute training session at their facility please contact us.  Examples of preferred environments for training are schools, offices, gyms, nursing homes, and rehabilitation centers.

At the moment we are also looking for a Transportation Sponsor.  We are in need of a 15- passenger van with low miles since we will be traveling often.  If your company would like to donate a van this would be a tax-deductible item.  In addition, we would be willing to feature your company on our website, t-shirts, brochures, and include the company on our vehicle wrap as our Transportation Sponsor.
story_txt:
Our Story
My name is Dorshan Millhouse.  I am the founder of Pawsitive Therapeutic Consulting Services an 
Animal-Assisted Therapy (AAT) & Animal-Assisted Activity (AAA) 
Organization.

What is Animal-Assisted Therapy? How does it work?  
In our case we specialize in Great Dane Therapy Dogs.  Professionals schedule a PTCS Therapy Dane to play an intricate roll in 
treatment sessions.  Patients or clients may be physically, socially, 
emotionally or cognitively challenged, and have specific goals/progress 
reports that will be updated throughout each session. Visitation is 
scheduled and worked around the individual’s needs.

In addition to Therapy work, PTCS volunteers time for Animal-Assisted Activity sessions. These 
visits can be spontaneous or scheduled.  Therapy Danes engage groups or 
individuals in a variety of social settings. Visitation times are 
considered flexible.  In Animal-Assisted Activities, no treatment is 
being performed or progress of a patient is being documented.  
Animal-Assisted Activities are fun and relaxed sessions where the 
Therapy Dane may entertain or just enjoy companionship.

The Impact
By donating today, you will be sponsoring the costs for our growing Dane in training.  Her training will allow her to participate in four programs we will be offering to the community.  These programs are FREE!!  



Pawsitive Assistance Canine Therapy (PACT) Program: 
 Therapy Danes enter into a “pact” to remain loyal and supportive when 
asked to assist in matters of the legal system, as well as Child 
Protective Services, in providing emotional support and relaxation to a

story:
Soccer Field

The Swain County Youth Soccer Association (www.swainsoccer.com) has partnered with Swain County, NC, to improve our Swain County Recreation Park Soccer Field. 

  • The old field is in bad shape and has never grown grass to play on.
  • This is the only public soccer field in the county.
  • Our local teams of competitive and recreational players (140 kids, ages 4-14) need a field.
  • Our recreational soccer league turns away kids due to lack of field space. 

Who We Are

  • Swain County is a small, rural county in the Southern Appalachians at the foot of the Great Smoky Mountains National Park.
  • Our county is economically distressed and local funds are limited.
  • Our players are from Swain County and the neighboring Qualla Boundary, home of the Eastern Band of the Cherokee Indians.

The Need

Swain's kids need soccer -

  • Our kids live in an economically distressed county.
  • 25.6% of Swain's kids live below the poverty level.
  • 53% of Swain's kids qualify for a reduced or free school lunch.
  • Obesity and sedentary lifestyles affect these children.
  • Organized aerobic play keeps kids healthy!

The Plan

To make a soccer field for Swain's kids -

  • We will crown the old field for proper drainage, install an irrigation system, and seed the field ($36,000).
  • With additional funds, we would install fence netting, a field marking system, and a storage building ($15,000).

So Far

  • We have raised $11,000 from our community and are looking for the $7,000 we need to start the first phase of the project.

Double Your Donation

Swain County has a matching grant for this project from the North Carolina Parks and Recreation Trust Fund.

  • Funds raised for the field will be matched up to $30,000, doubling your contribution.
  • SYSA is a registered 501(c)(3) North Carolina non-profit corporation.
  • Donations are tax deductible to the extent allowed by law.

Help Now

We hope to have our project funded by our community, matching grant, and Indiegogo donors by late April so we can start work this May and be ready for the fall season.

Spread the Word

Even if you can't contribute today, help us out by spreading the word:

  • Share this campaign with your friends and contacts to help us help Swain's kids.
